original: Liafal: I tried to speak with him when the theft was reported.[p/] But he didn't much care about the missing artifact.
translation: Liafal: 盗窃案上报时我试图找他谈谈。[p/]但他对丢失的远古遗物不是很在意。

original: Liafal: He told me to leave him alone and let the Kingsguard investigate the Sword. [mind="He was probably busy making the changes to his will."/]
translation: Liafal: 他让我别管他，然后派了国王卫队去调查失踪的剑。[mind="他可能正在忙着修改遗嘱。"/]

original: Now [i]that's[/i] an interesting thought...
translation: <u>这</u>个想法可有趣了……

original: Tyrion: ...When did you speak with him last?
translation: Tyrion: ……你最后一次和他交谈是什么时候？

original: Liafal: It was before they activated the lockdown.[p/] It was a little after 1:00 AM that night.
translation: Liafal: 激活封锁之前，[p/]晚上凌晨 1:00 刚过不久。

original: Tyrion: ...And do you have any idea what he was doing in his study?
translation: Tyrion: ……你知道他在书房里做什么吗？

original: Liafal: ...What?
translation: Liafal: ……什么？

original: Liafal: N-[p/][s/]No...[p/] I have no idea.
translation: Liafal: 不、[p/][s/]不清楚……[p/]我不知道。

original: You detect some fear from her.
translation: 你察觉到她有一些恐惧。

original: Tyrion: Lady Frega,[p/] is there something you're not telling us?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加小姐，[p/]你还有什么事情没告诉我们吗？

original: Tyrion: It's important that we know about your father's actions before his death.
translation: Tyrion: 了解你父亲生前的行为对我们来说很重要。

original: Liafal: ...I'm sorry.[p/] I don't know anything else.
translation: Liafal: ……抱歉。[p/]我没什么要说的了。

original: Liafal: My father was a private man and didn't share much with anyone,[p/] even his own family.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲是个很注重隐私的人，[p/]即便是对家人，他也不会分享太多事情。

original: Liafal: I wish I could be of more help,[p/] but I really don't know anything else. [mind="I refuse to believe that's why he was killed."/]
translation: Liafal: 我希望能帮上忙，[p/]但我知道的确实就这么多。[mind="我绝不相信<u>那是</u>他被杀的原因。"/]

original: She's clearly holding something back.
translation: 她显然有所隐瞒。

original: If you can reveal what she's hiding through an ARGUMENT,[p/] she might be more willing to cooperate.
translation: 如果你能通过 <size=1.5em>辩论</size> 揭示她隐藏的东西，[p/]她可能会更愿意配合。

original: But you'll need more information about William and his will first.
translation: 但是首先，你需要更多关于威廉以及遗嘱的信息。

original: In the meantime,[p/] you should figure out what else she knows.
translation: 与此同时，[p/]你应该弄清楚她还知道些什么。

original: Tyrion: I noticed that this room hasn't been cleaned recently.[p/] Do you know why?
translation: Tyrion: 我注意到这个房间最近没有打扫过。[p/]你知道为什么吗？

original: Liafal: It's because I've forbidden the servants from cleaning this room.
translation: Liafal: 因为我禁止仆人打扫这个房间。

original: Tyrion: ...And why would you do that?
translation: Tyrion: ……那你为什么这么做？

original: Liafal: Beatrice was-...[p/] [i]is[/i] very dear to me,[p/] and I couldn't bear to have her room disturbed after she left.
translation: Liafal: 比亚特丽丝曾经是、[p/]<u>现在也是</u>我亲爱的姐姐，[p/]我不允许有人在她离开后擅动她的房间。

original: Liafal: This room was the only memory I had of her after she left.
translation: Liafal: 这间屋子是她离开后我对她唯一的记忆。

original: You suppose that makes sense.[p/] She must have been holding onto the hope that her sister would return.
translation: 你觉得她的解释说得通。[p/]她一定一直抱着姐姐会回来的希望。

original: Tyrion: And what about the Sword of Spell Eating?[p/] Do you know how it ended up in this room?
translation: Tyrion: 关于噬法之剑呢？[p/]你知道它为什么会在这个房间吗？

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I'm not sure.[p/] It's possible someone planted it here to frame Beatrice.
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我不太确定。[p/]可能有人把它放在这里来陷害比亚特丽丝。

original: Liafal: I can't say why they would choose this room, though.
translation: Liafal: 虽然我不知道他们为什么会选择这个房间。

original: Tyrion: What kind of person was your father?
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲是个什么样的人？

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Hm...[p/] It doesn't look like William Frega was very beloved.
translation: 嗯……[p/]看起来威廉·弗雷加不太受人喜爱。

original: Liafal: My father was a...[p/] complicated man.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲是个……[p/]复杂的人。

original: Liafal: He was a brilliant scholar and businessman...[p/] But he was a cold and distant father.
translation: Liafal: 他是杰出的学者和商人……[p/]但他也是冷漠且疏远的父亲。

original: Tyrion: I see.[p/] Did he have any enemies?
translation: Tyrion: 我知道了。[p/]他有什么敌人吗？

original: Liafal: As the head of House Frega,[p/] he controlled nearly every banking house in Wyverngarde.
translation: Liafal: 作为弗雷加家族的首领，[p/]他几乎控制了维文加德所有的银行。

original: Liafal: There were many people who resented his wealth and power.
translation: Liafal: 有很多人愤恨他的财富和权力。

original: Tyrion: Can you remember anyone specific?[p/] Perhaps someone that he'd slighted recently?
translation: Tyrion: 你能想起具体的某个人吗？[p/]或许是他最近得罪过的人？

original: Liafal: There [i]was[/i] Lloyd von Sanctus.
translation: Liafal: 那<u>就是</u>洛伊德·冯·桑克图斯。

original: Tyrion: ...The ruling Lord of Aurinax?
translation: Tyrion: ……欧奥耐克斯的领主？

original: Liafal: Yes.[p/] I heard that he was recently involved in a court case.
translation: Liafal: 对。[p/]我听说他最近卷入了一起官司。

original: Liafal: My father has been using the controversy as an opportunity to slowly take control of Von Sanctus Industries.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲正以这次风波为机会，逐步控制冯·桑克图斯工业产业。

original: Liafal: And from what I've heard,[p/] he's been extremely bitter about that.
translation: Liafal: 据我所知，[p/]他对此一直极为不满。

original: Von Sanctus's reputation must have taken a hit after the Dracogen trials.
translation: 冯·桑克图斯的声誉在德拉科根案件后肯定受到了打击。

original: You doubt he'd get himself involved in [i]another[/i] murder.
translation: 你不觉得他会<u>再</u>卷入一起谋杀案。

original: But you can never be too sure.[p/] You'll want to speak with him and get more details.
translation: 但你也不太肯定。[p/]你需要和他谈谈，了解更多细节。

original: ...Although,[p/] would he even consider cooperating with you?
translation: ……不过，[p/]他会考虑和你合作吗？

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] are there any other enemies he might have had?
translation: Tyrion: 先不提他，[p/]你父亲还有其他的敌人吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] None that I can think of.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]我想不到了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about Beatrice Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 关于比亚特丽丝·弗雷加，你能告诉我些什么？

original: Tyrion: I heard that she fled the Frega estate five years ago.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说她五年前离开了弗雷加庄园。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: Before she left,[p/] Beatrice was one of the most powerful mages I'd ever seen.
translation: Liafal: 在她离开前，[p/]比亚特丽丝是我认识的最强大的法师。

original: Liafal: She was...[p/] She [i]is[/i] incredible.
translation: Liafal: 她……[p/]她非常了不起。

original: Liafal: At the age of thirteen,[p/] her talent for magic had even eclipsed my father's.
translation: Liafal: 她十三岁的时候，[p/]在魔法方面的天赋甚至已经超过了我父亲。

original: Liafal: ...But it was never enough for him.
translation: Liafal: ……但他还是不满足。

original: Tyrion: What do you mean?
translation: Tyrion: 什么意思？

original: Liafal: Before my mother died,[p/] he desperately wanted a son,[p/] but he only ever had daughters.
translation: Liafal: 我母亲去世前，[p/]他迫切地想要一个儿子，[p/]但他只有女儿。

original: Liafal: Everyone thought that Beatrice would inherit House Frega from my father,[p/] but our family knew the truth.
translation: Liafal: 人们都以为比亚特丽丝会从我父亲那里继承弗雷加家族，[p/]但我们全家都知道事实并非如此。

original: Liafal: William Frega would never leave his legacy in the hands of a woman.
translation: Liafal: 威廉·弗雷加永远不会把他的遗产交到一个女人手里。

original: Celeste: What...?
translation: Celeste: 什么……？

original: Liafal: No matter how hard Beatrice tried,[p/] my father would never acknowledge her accomplishments.
translation: Liafal: 无论比亚特丽丝多么努力，[p/]我父亲都不会认可她的成就。

original: Liafal: He was extremely cruel to her.[p/] He constantly belittled her achievements and dismissed anything she said to him.
translation: Liafal: 他对她极其残忍。[p/]不断贬低她的成就，对她所说的任何话都不予理会。

original: Liafal: And after the accident,[p/] he used her disability as an excuse to take away the little influence she had.
translation: Liafal: 事故发生后，[p/]他以残疾为借口，剥夺了她仅有的一点影响力。

original: There was an "accident" that gave her a disability?[p/] Is that why she's blind?
translation: 一场“事故”导致了她的残疾吗？[p/]那是她失明的原因？

original: Tyrion: If it's not too painful for you,[p/] could you tell me more about Beatrice's accident?
translation: Tyrion: 如果可以的话，[p/]能和我聊聊比亚特丽丝的事故吗？

original: Liafal: ...Is this even relevant to the investigation?
translation: Liafal: ……那和调查有任何关系吗？

original: Tyrion: Any small detail could make a difference.[p/] I need to learn everything I can.
translation: Tyrion: 任何微小的细节都可能产生影响。[p/]我需要尽可能多了解些信息。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: I'm not sure about exactly what happened.[p/] But it was a magical experiment gone wrong.
translation: Liafal: 我不确定到底发生了什么。[p/]但是那场魔法实验出了问题。

original: Liafal: Beatrice was working on a project at the Imperial Academy.[p/] She was trying to create a new spell formula.
translation: Liafal: 当时比亚特丽丝正在帝国学院参加一个项目。[p/]她在尝试创造一种新的法术范式。

original: Liafal: We're still not sure what happened.[p/] But there was an adverse magical reaction.
translation: Liafal: 我们尚且不清楚发生了什么。[p/]但出现了不良的魔法反应。

original: Liafal: ...The resulting explosion seriously injured her and left her completely blind.
translation: Liafal: ……因此导致的爆炸使得她严重受伤，并完全失明。

original: Tyrion: I can't imagine how she must have taken that.
translation: Tyrion: 我无法想象她是如何接受这一切的。

original: Liafal: Actually,[p/] she was probably the most unfazed by what happened.
translation: Liafal: 实际上，[p/]她可能是对这一切反应最平静的人。

original: Liafal: ...But that didn't matter,[p/] my father saw his opportunity.
translation: Liafal: ……但这不重要，[p/]父亲看到了他的机会。

original: Liafal: He told me that he was "relieving her of her duties so that she could recover".
translation: Liafal: 父亲告诉我，他“减轻了她的职责，以便她能够康复”。

original: Liafal: But I knew the truth.[p/] He was going to take away her political power and social standing.
translation: Liafal: 但我知道真相。[p/]他打算夺走她的政治权力和社会地位。

original: Liafal: She was reduced to a mere decoration for our home.
translation: Liafal: 她沦为了我们家纯粹的摆设。

original: Tyrion: ...And [i]that[/i] must have been why she left.
translation: Tyrion: ……而<u>那</u>一定是她离开的原因。

original: Tyrion: Did she contact you during the time that she was missing?
translation: Tyrion: 她失踪期间有联系过你吗？

original: Liafal: No.[p/] No one had heard from her during that time.
translation: Liafal: 没有。[p/]在那期间没人收到过她的消息。

original: Liafal: But as much as I was worried for her,[p/] I was also a little happy.
translation: Liafal: 不过在为她担心的同时，[p/]我也有些高兴。

original: Liafal: Unlike Miriam and I,[p/] she had finally broken free from my father.
translation: Liafal: 与米莉亚姆和我不同，[p/]她最终摆脱了父亲。

original: Liafal: I have no idea what would cause her to return here.
translation: Liafal: 我不知道是什么原因让她回到了这里。

original: Liafal: I've heard of you.[p/] You're that defense attorney that everyone is talking about.
translation: Liafal: 我听说过你。[p/]你就是那个大家都在谈论的辩护律师。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wow...[p/] I didn't expect you to know who I was.
translation: Tyrion: 哇、[p/][s/]哇哦……[p/]我没想到你会知道我。

original: Liafal: Yes.[p/] Many nobles are uneasy due to your recent actions.
translation: Liafal: 当然。[p/]你最近的举动让很多贵族坐立难安。

original: Liafal: It's very clear that no one is safe from you.
translation: Liafal: 显然没人能从你手上逃脱。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/][s/]噢……

original: Tyrion: I'm sure Beatrice's return must have been surprising for you.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道比亚特丽丝的归来让你很惊讶。

original: Liafal: It is.[p/] To be honest,[p/] I've been hoping for years that she'd finally return.
translation: Liafal: 是啊。[p/]坦白说，[p/]这么多年我一直希望她能回来。

original: Liafal: But now that she has,[p/] she's just gotten pulled into another one of our family's messes.
translation: Liafal: 但现在她回来了，[p/]却只是卷入了我们家的又一个烂摊子。

original: Tyrion: What is your relationship like with Miriam?
translation: Tyrion: 你和米莉亚姆的关系怎么样？

original: Liafal: My youngest sister?[p/] I actually don't see her that much.
translation: Liafal: 我的小妹妹？[p/]其实我不常见到她。

original: Celeste: Really?[p/] Even though you're sisters?
translation: Celeste: 真的吗？[p/]即使你们是姐妹？

original: Liafal: Our lives as nobles keep us very busy.[p/] We rarely have the chance to speak with each other.
translation: Liafal: 作为贵族，我们的生活非常忙碌。[p/]很少有机会能相互交谈。

original: Liafal: And ever since Beatrice fled the estate,[p/] she's been throwing herself into her schoolwork.
translation: Liafal: 而且自从比亚特丽丝离开庄园后，[p/]她就一直忙于学业。

original: Liafal: That man...[p/] he was my father,[p/] but I can't say I have fond memories of him.
translation: Liafal: 那个人……[p/]他是我父亲，[p/]但我对他的记忆并不美好。

original: Tyrion: He must have been difficult to deal with.
translation: Tyrion: 他一定很难相处。

original: Liafal: You have no idea.[p/] He was cruel,[p/] tyrannical,[p/] and only ever cared about his own legacy.
translation: Liafal: 你根本想不到。[p/]他很残忍，[p/]专横，[p/]并且只关心他自己的遗产。

original: Liafal: He was willing to sacrifice anything and anyone to maintain his power and status,[p/] including his own daughters.
translation: Liafal:  为了维护自己的权力和地位，他不惜牺牲任何人和任何事，[p/]包括自己的女儿。

original: Tyrion: It sounds like his treatment of Beatrice was particularly harsh.
translation: Tyrion: 听起来他对比亚特丽丝格外严苛。

original: Liafal: It was.[p/] He never saw her as a worthy successor to our family's legacy, simply because she was a woman.
translation: Liafal: 是的。[p/]他从未把她视为家族遗产的合适继承人，仅仅因为她是个女人。

original: Liafal: Even after her accident,[p/] he used her disability as an excuse to strip her of any power she had left.
translation: Liafal: 甚至在她发生事故之后，[p/]以她的残疾为借口，剥夺了她仅剩的权力。

original: Tyrion: I can only imagine how difficult that must have been for all of you.
translation: Tyrion: 我可以想象那对你们所有人来说有多难过。

original: Liafal: It's been a constant struggle,[p/] but we managed to survive.
translation: Liafal: 这段时间很难熬，[p/]但我们坚持过来了。

original: Liafal: As bad as it sounds,[p/] now that he's gone,[p/] we might have a chance to rebuild our family.
translation: Liafal: 虽然听起来很糟糕，[p/]但现在他死了，[p/]我们也许有机会重建我们的家族。

original: Liafal: Even after being blinded,[p/] Beatrice continued to fight for her freedom.
translation: Liafal: 即使失明了，[p/]比亚特丽丝也在为她的自由抗争。

original: Liafal: Despite everything that's happened to her,[p/] she's always remained determined to live her life on her own terms.
translation: Liafal: 尽管她经历了种种事情，[p/]但她始终决意要按照自己的方式生活。

original: Liafal: I remember when she first came back to the estate after her accident,[p/] my father was convinced that she'd be completely helpless without her sight.
translation: Liafal: 我记得她出事后第一次回到庄园时，[p/]父亲确信她失明后就会变成一个废人。

original: Liafal: But she refused to let her blindness define her.[p/] She learned how to navigate the estate using her other senses and continued to study magic.
translation: Liafal: 但她拒绝让失明定义自己。[p/]她学会了如何利用其他感官在庄园里行走，并继续学习魔法。

original: Liafal: It's ironic,[p/] really.[p/] My father tried to use her disability as a way to control her,[p/] but in the end,[p/] it was the very thing that allowed her to break free.
translation: Liafal: 这很讽刺，[p/]真的。[p/]父亲试图利用她的残疾来控制她，[p/]但最终，[p/]正是这一点让她获得了自由。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Lady Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加小姐，关于这件事你能告诉我些什么？

original: Liafal: My apologies.[p/] I don't think I'll be of much help with that.
translation: Liafal: 抱歉。[p/]我恐怕帮不上忙。

original: Liafal: Come on, Tracker...[p/] Where are you?
translation: Liafal: 来吧，追追……[p/]你在哪儿？

original: Tyrion: Aaaaaa[p/][s/]choo!
translation: Tyrion: 阿阿阿[p/][s/]嚏！

original: As you enter Beatrice's Room,[p/] you're unexpectedly met with a large cloud of dust.
translation: 进入比亚特丽丝·弗雷加的卧室时，[p/]你和一大团灰尘不期而遇。

original: Celeste: Wow...[p/] This place has [i]not[/i] been cleaned.
translation: Celeste: 哇……[p/]这个地方<u>没有</u>打扫过。

original: Liafal: Oh?
translation: Liafal: 哦？

original: Your vision clears up.[p/] And you realize that there's someone else in the room with you.
translation: 你的视线变得清晰起来。[p/]然后你意识到房间里还有其他人。

original: Tyrion: S-[p/][s/]Sorry...[p/] I didn't mean to intrude.
translation: Tyrion: 抱、[p/][s/]抱歉……[p/]我不是有意闯进来的。

original: Liafal: No.[p/] There's no need to apologize.
translation: Liafal: 不。[p/]没必要道歉。

original: Liafal: But I [i]would[/i] like to know what you're doing here.
translation: Liafal: 但我<u>倒是想</u>知道你在这里做什么。

original: Celeste: We're here on behalf of the Crown Prince.[p/] We're investigating the murder of William Frega.
translation: Celeste: 我们是代表王储殿下来这里的。[p/]正在调查威廉·弗雷加的谋杀案。

original: Liafal: O-[p/][s/]Oh,[p/] I see.
translation: Liafal: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，[p/]我明白了。

original: Tyrion: My apologies...[p/] I didn't quite get your name.
translation: Tyrion: 抱歉……[p/]还不知道你的名字。

original: Liafal: ...My name is Laefe.[p/] Laefe Frega.
translation: Liafal: ……我是拉菲。[p/]拉菲·弗雷加。

original: So [i]this[/i] is Laefe.[p/] According to Steelwind,[p/] she was the last person to see Lord Frega alive yesterday.
translation: 所以她<u>就是</u>拉菲。[p/]斯蒂尔文德说，[p/]她是昨天最后一个见到弗雷加勋爵活着的人。

original: She might have some information about how he was acting that night.
translation: 她也许能提供弗雷加勋爵当晚行为举止的线索。

original: You think you've learned everything you can for now.
translation: 你认为你已经掌握了目前能得知的所有线索。

original: Perhaps you should MOVE elsewhere.
translation: 你应该<size=1.5em>移动</size>去别处看看。

original: Anyways,[p/] you think that you've learned everything you can from Laefe.
translation: 总之，[p/]你应该已经获得了拉菲能提供的所有线索。

original: :There's only one last person to speak with:[p/] Harold Haroldson.
translation: :最后，[p/]只需要和哈罗德·哈罗德森谈谈了。

original: Liafal: You can ask me as many times as you like.
translation: Liafal: 你问我多少次都可以。

original: Liafal: The answer will remain the same.
translation: Liafal: 答案不会变的。

original: Damn it...[p/] You're still not getting through.
translation: 可恶……[p/]你还是说服不了她。

original: OK
translation: OK

original: Laefe Frega seems to be hiding what her father was doing in his study.
translation: 拉菲·弗雷加似乎在隐瞒她父亲在书房里的所作所为。

original: You doubt that she's doing this out of malice.[p/] She might not even think that it's relevant to the case.
translation: 你猜她这样做并非出于恶意。[p/]她甚至可能认为那与案件无关。

original: But William Frega had many enemies,[p/] and he retreated into his study to do [i]something[/i] that night.
translation: 但是威廉·弗雷加有很多敌人，[p/]而且那天晚上他回书房做了<u>什么</u>。

original: And that "something" could be related to why he was murdered.
translation: 而他做的“那件事”可能与他被谋杀有关。

original: Yes
translation: 是

original: No
translation: 否

original: Tyrion: Is there something you're not telling us, Laefe?
translation: Tyrion: 你还有什么没告诉我们的吗，拉菲？

original: Tyrion: Because I have a feeling that you know more than you're letting on.
translation: Tyrion: 因为我感觉你知道的比你透露的要多。

original: Liafal: W-[p/][s/]What?
translation: Liafal: 什、[p/][s/]什么？

original: Tyrion: What was your father doing in his study?
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲在书房里做什么？

original: Liafal: I already told you.[p/] I don't know.
translation: Liafal: 我告诉过你。[p/]我不知道。

original: Liafal: My father was a private man.[p/] He wouldn't share something like that with me.
translation: Liafal: 我父亲是个很注重隐私的人。[p/]他不会告诉我那样的事情。

original: Tyrion: He was making some sort of change to his will,[p/] wasn't he?
translation: Tyrion: 他在对他的遗嘱做某种修改，[p/]是吗？

original: Liafal: W-[p/][s/]What?! [mind="Did someone else tell him?"/]
translation: Liafal: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[mind="是别人告诉他的吗？"/]

original: Liafal: ...What is this?
translation: Liafal: ……这是什么？

original: Tyrion: It's proof that you had [i]some[/i] idea of what your father was doing in his study!
translation: Tyrion: 这是你对你父亲在书房的行为<u>有所了解</u>的证据！

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] I don't think [i]that[/i] really proves anything.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我认为<u>这</u>证明不了什么。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢……

original: Perhaps it would be best to try something else.
translation: 也许应该试试别的证据。

original: Tyrion: Why did you find the need to hide this from us?
translation: Tyrion: 你为什么觉得有必要向我们隐瞒这件事？

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I didn't!
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我没有！

original: The thoughts you saw earlier seem to disagree with that.
translation: 你先前看到的想法似乎与此并不一致。

original: Tyrion: We've only just met today.[p/] So I understand if you don't trust us.
translation: Tyrion: 我们今天才刚刚见过面。[p/]所以我能理解你对我们的不信任。

original: Tyrion: But the Inquisition thinks that [i]Beatrice[/i] murdered your father.[p/] And they claim that she did so for his inheritance.
translation: Tyrion: 但是裁判所认为<u>比亚特丽丝</u>谋杀了你父亲。[p/]并且声称她这么做是为了他的遗产。

original: Liafal: That's absolutely absurd!
translation: Liafal: 这太荒谬了！

original: Tyrion: Regardless,[p/] your father's inheritance is a likely motive behind his murder.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，[p/]你父亲的遗产很可能是他被谋杀的动机。

original: Tyrion: Many people would have a lot to gain from his death...[p/] including you.
translation: Tyrion: 他的死能让很多人获益匪浅……[p/]包括你。

original: Liafal: [i]Excuse[/i] me?!
translation: Liafal: 你说<u>什么</u>？！

original: Liafal: How could you even [i]think[/i] that I'd be capable of something like this?!
translation: Liafal: 你竟然<u>认为</u>我能做出这样的事情？！

original: Rationalize [d="I didn't mean to imply that you were involved in this. But it's clear that the murderer's motive was to take control of House Frega."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="我不是想说你与谋杀有关。但凶手的动机明显是要掌控弗雷加家族。"/]

original: TYRION: I didn't mean to imply that you were involved in this.
translation: TYRION: 我不是想说你与谋杀有关。

original: Tyrion: But it's clear that the murderer's motive was to take control of House Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 但凶手的动机明显是要掌控弗雷加家族。

original: Tyrion: This means that their plan heavily relied on who William Frega was leaving his assets to.
translation: Tyrion: 这意味着他们的计划很大程度上取决于威廉·弗雷加把他的资产留给了谁。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: So I need to know, Ms. Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 所以弗雷加女士，我需要知道。

original: Tyrion: How was your father planning to change his will?
translation: Tyrion: 你父亲打算如何修改他的遗嘱？

original: Threaten [d="The prosecution clearly won't shy away from prosecuting members of your family. If your sister is truly innocent, where do you think they'll turn their attention next?"/]
translation: Threaten [d="检方显然不会放过你们家族的人。如果你姐姐真的是无辜的，你觉得他们接下来会把注意力转向哪里？"/]

original: Tyrion: It doesn't matter what I think.
translation: Tyrion: 我怎么想不重要。

original: Tyrion: The prosecution clearly won't shy away from prosecuting members of your family.
translation: Tyrion: 检方显然不会放过你们家族的人。

original: Tyrion: You were the last person to see your father alive. So if your sister is truly innocent,[p/] where do you think they'll turn their attention next?
translation: Tyrion: 你是最后一个看到他还活着的人。那么如果你姐姐真的是无辜的，[p/]你觉得他们接下来会把注意力转向哪里？

original: Liafal: Please.[p/] Do you think I'll respond to such empty threats?
translation: Liafal: 拜托。[p/]你觉得这种虚张声势的威胁对我有用？

original: Liafal: I have cooperated with the Inquisition.[p/] I have nothing to hide.
translation: Liafal: 我配合了裁判所的调查。[p/]没有什么可隐瞒的。

original: Doubt [d="I'm not so sure... You were the last person to see your father alive. It's possible that you've been lying to us."/]
translation: Doubt [d="我不太确定……但你是最后一个见到活着的弗雷加勋爵的人。而你可能对我们撒了谎。"/]

original: Tyrion: I'm not so sure...
translation: Tyrion: 我不太确定……

original: Tyrion: You were the last person to see your father alive.
translation: Tyrion: 但你是最后一个见到活着的弗雷加勋爵的人。

original: Tyrion: It's possible that you've been lying to us.
translation: Tyrion: 而你可能对我们撒了谎。

original: Liafal: And what could I have [i]possibly[/i] gained by doing that?
translation: Liafal: 我那么做又<u>能</u>得到什么呢？

original: Liafal: I gave my testimony to the Inquisition of my own volition!
translation: Liafal: 我是自愿向裁判所提供证词的！

original: Liafal: If I had truly been involved,[p/] I would have simply stayed silent.
translation: Liafal: 如果我真的参与了谋杀，[p/]那我只要保持沉默就好。

original: Right...[p/] She has a point there.
translation: 好吧……[p/]她说的有道理。

original: Liafal: I-[p/][s/]I don't know...[p/]
translation: Liafal: 我、[p/][s/]我不知道……[p/]

original: Liafal: I've already told you.[p/] My father was a secretive man.
translation: Liafal: 我告诉过你了。[p/]我的父亲是个注重隐私的人。

original: Liafal: He didn't share the details of his estate with me.
translation: Liafal: 他不会向我透露遗产的详细情况。

original: Tyrion: Is that really true, though?
translation: Tyrion: 不过，真的是那样吗？

original: Liafal: ...What?
translation: Liafal: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: I already know about your arranged marriage to Jaiden von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 我已经知道你和杰登·冯·桑克图斯有婚约了。

original: Tyrion: And I also know that as a part of this deal,[p/] Jaiden would inherit House Frega instead of you.
translation: Tyrion: 我还知道作为交易的一部分，[p/]杰登会代替你继承弗雷加家族。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: You definitely knew about this.[p/] And you heavily resisted the marriage in an attempt to stall it.
translation: Tyrion: 你绝对知道这件事。[p/]并且强烈抵制这桩婚姻，试图拖延它。

original: Tyrion: Which means that you had [i]some[/i] idea of how your father's will was arranged.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说你对你父亲的遗嘱安排是有<u>一些</u>了解的。

original: Liafal: ...What is this?
translation: Liafal: ……这是什么？

original: Tyrion: It's proof that you had [i]some[/i] idea of what your father was doing to his will!
translation: Tyrion: 这是你对你父亲的遗嘱安排有所了解的证据！

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] I don't think [i]that[/i] really proves anything.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我认为<u>这</u>证明不了什么。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢……

original: Perhaps it would be best to try something else.
translation: 也许应该试试别的证据。

original: Tyrion: So what aren't you telling me, Ms. Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 所以弗雷加女士，你还有什么没告诉我们吗？

original: Liafal: I...
translation: Liafal: 我……

original: Liafal: I can't trust you.
translation: Liafal: 我没法信任你。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Liafal: You are here on behalf of Crown Prince Aster.
translation: Liafal: 你是代表阿斯特王储来这里的。

original: Liafal: The Four Pillar families [i]and[/i] the Crown have much to gain from my father's death.
translation: Liafal: 四大支柱家族<u>和</u>王室能从我父亲的死中获得很多好处。

original: Liafal: How can you assure me that this information won't be used against my family?
translation: Liafal: 你如何向我保证这些信息不会被用来对付我的家人？

original: So [i]that's[/i] why she's been so secretive.
translation: 所以<u>这就是</u>她守口如瓶的原因。

original: Appeal [d="There's nothing I could possibly say to make you trust me. But please understand, I'm only trying to find out who murdered your father."/]
translation: Appeal [d="我很难说什么让你相信我。但请理解，我只是想找出杀害你父亲的凶手。"/]

original: Tyrion: There's nothing I could possibly say to make you trust me.
translation: Tyrion: 我很难说什么让你相信我。

original: Tyrion: But please understand,[p/] I'm only trying to find out who murdered your father.
translation: Tyrion: 但请理解，[p/]我只是想找出杀害你父亲的凶手。

original: Tyrion: And to do that,[p/] I need to know everything that he was doing that night.
translation: Tyrion: 为此，[p/]我需要知道他那天晚上做的所有事。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Rationalize [d="I may have been hired by Prince Aster. But I'm an independent agent. I have no stake in this conflict. I was only hired to arrive at the truth."/]
translation: Rationalize [d="虽然我受雇于阿斯特王子。但我也是个独立行动者。这场冲突与我无关。我只是被雇来查明真相的。"/]

original: Tyrion: I may have been hired by Prince Aster.[p/] But I'm an independent agent.
translation: Tyrion: 虽然我受雇于阿斯特王子。[p/]但我也是个独立行动者。

original: Tyrion: I have no stake in this conflict.[p/] I was only hired to arrive at the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 这场冲突与我无关。[p/]我只是被雇来查明真相的。

original: Liafal: How can you expect me to trust you when you're so obviously close to Prince Aster and Lady Steelwind?
translation: Liafal: 显然你与阿斯特王子和斯蒂尔文德小姐关系密切，你怎么能指望我相信你呢？

original: Liafal: I'm sorry,[p/] but I just can't trust you.
translation: Liafal: 抱歉，[p/]但我没法信任你。

original: Trust is a matter of emotion,[p/] not logic.
translation: 信任是一种情感，[p/]而非逻辑。

original: You should try another approach.
translation: 应该试试别的。

original: Threaten [d="I'll arrive at the truth. One way or another. If you refuse to cooperate with me, I'll have no choice but to treat you as another suspect."/]
translation: Threaten [d="无论如何，我都会找到真相。如果你拒绝与我合作，那我别无选择，只能把你当作另一个嫌疑人来对待。"/]

original: Tyrion: I'll arrive at the truth.[p/] One way or another.
translation: Tyrion: 无论如何，我都会找到真相。

original: Tyrion: If you refuse to cooperate with me,[p/] I'll have no choice but to treat you as another suspect.
translation: Tyrion: 如果你拒绝与我合作，[p/]那我别无选择，只能把你当作另一个嫌疑人来对待。

original: Liafal: And if you find this truth,[p/] you'll know that I have done nothing worthy of an indictment.
translation: Liafal:  如果发现了真相，[p/]你就会知道我没有做任何值得起诉的事。

original: ...It appears that your bluff didn't work.
translation: ……看来你的虚张声势没有奏效。

original: Liafal: I have no reason to trust you.
translation: Liafal: 我没理由相信你。

original: Liafal: But somehow...[p/] I can tell that you're being sincere.
translation: Liafal: 但不知道为什么……[p/]我能感觉到你的真诚。

original: Liafal: ...Will you really protect Beatrice?
translation: Liafal: ……你真的会保护比亚特丽丝吗？

original: You're about to reassure her that you will,[p/] but something in the back of your mind stops you.
translation: 你正想向她保证你会的，[p/]但是脑海深处的某个念头阻止了你。

original: Tyrion: ...I'll get to the truth of what really happened.
translation: Tyrion: ……我会弄清楚到底发生了什么事。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: Okay.[p/] If that's truly what you're planning to do,[p/] I'll tell you what I know.
translation: Liafal: 好吧。[p/]如果你真的打算那么做，[p/]那我就把我知道的告诉你。

original: Tyrion: It's a highly extravagant bed.[p/] It looks similar to the one in Miriam's dorm.
translation: Tyrion: 这是一张非常奢华的床。[p/]它看起来和米莉亚姆宿舍里的那张床很相似。

original: Tracker: This Tracker's bed.[p/] It's like resting on cloud.
translation: Tracker: 这是追追的床。[p/]像躺在云上一样舒服。

original: Tyrion: It's a dresser covered in a layer of dust.[p/] It doesn't look like it's been touched in years.
translation: Tyrion: 梳妆台上积了一层灰。[p/]它看起来好些年没被碰过了。

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Tyrion: It's a table for guests.[p/] But it's extremely dusty.
translation: Tyrion: 这是给客人用的桌子。[p/]但灰尘特别多。

original: You should never see this dialogue.
translation: 你不该看到这句台词。

original: Tyrion: "Tracker"...[p/] Is that your name?
translation: Tyrion: “追追”……[p/]是你的名字吗？

original: Liafal: How did you-?
translation: Liafal: 你怎么——？

original: Tracker: Yes.[p/] "Tracker" is Tracker.[p/] That's the name queen gib to me.
translation: Tracker: 是的。追追的名字是“追追”。[p/]是女皇起的名纸。

original: Tracker gestures to Laefe when he mentions his "queen".
translation: 追追提到“女皇”时指了指拉菲。

original: Tyrion: He called you his "queen".[p/] Do you know him, Laefe?
translation: Tyrion: 他说你是他的“女皇”。[p/]你认识他吗，拉菲？

original: Liafal: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...[p/] But how-?
translation: Liafal: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]但怎么——？

original: Celeste: How are you talking to it?!
translation: Celeste: 你是怎么跟它说话的？！

original: Tyrion: A-[p/][s/]Ah...[p/] That's-
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/][s/]呃……[p/]是——

original: You were so caught up in speaking to Tracker.[p/] You didn't realize how strange this scene must look to everyone else.
translation: 你全神贯注地在和追追说话。[p/]完全没意识到这一幕在其他人看来肯定很奇怪。

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I'm...[p/] a dog whisperer.
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我是……[p/]一个犬语者。

original: Celeste: You've never mentioned that before...
translation: Celeste: 你之前从来没提起过……

original: Orym: Do you honestly expect us to believe something like that?!
translation: Orym: 你真的认为我们会信这种事？！

original: Liafal: But Tracker says he can understand him.[p/] He told me himself.
translation: Liafal: 但是追追说卡斯伯特先生能理解他。[p/]他亲口告诉我了。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/][s/] How do [i]you[/i] know that?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>你</u>怎么知道？

original: Liafal: U-[p/][s/]Um...
translation: Liafal: 唔、[p/][s/]呃……

original: Tyrion: So Laefe,[p/] how are [i]you[/i] able to communicate with Tracker?
translation: Tyrion: 那么拉菲，[p/]<u>你</u>为什么能和追追沟通？

original: Liafal: ...
translation: Liafal: ……

original: Liafal: *sigh*[p/] I suppose there's no sense in hiding it anymore.
translation: Liafal: *叹气* [p/]我想已经没必要再隐瞒了。

original: Liafal: Tracker is my familiar.
translation: Liafal: 追追是我的使魔。

original: Tyrion: Familiar...[p/] So it's the same magical bond Harold has with his monkey.
translation: Tyrion: 使魔……[p/]所以跟哈罗德和他的猴子之间的魔法契约是一样的。

original: You recall that the [b]Familial Bond[/b] spell allows the caster to telepathically speak with their familiar.
translation: 你记得[b]使魔契约[/b]法术能使施法者与使魔进行心灵感应。

original: That must be how she's speaking to him.
translation: 那肯定就是她和追追说话的方式。

original: Orym: ...You never mentioned him during questioning.
translation: Orym: ……询问期间你完全没提到过他。

original: Liafal: It wasn't relevant to the investigation...
translation: Liafal: 这和调查无关……

original: Liafal: And I've...[p/] been keeping him a secret from my family.
translation: Liafal: 而且我……[p/]我的家人也不知道追追的存在。

original: Tyrion: I suppose that makes sense...[p/] I doubt William Frega would've allowed you to keep an animal in his home.
translation: Tyrion: 我理解了……[p/]威廉·弗雷加应该不会允许你在家里养宠物。

original: Orym: Well...[p/] I don't appreciate you keeping this info from us.
translation: Orym: 好吧……[p/]我不赞成你对我们隐瞒这个信息。

original: Orym: But...[p/] It [i]doesn't[/i] look like anyone got hurt.
translation: Orym: 不过……[p/]看起来似乎<u>没有</u>人因此受伤。

original: Orym: And aside from this dog,[p/] we haven't really found anything new.
translation: Orym: 而除了这只狗，[p/]我们确实没有发现任何新的线索。

original: Damn it...[p/] They didn't find any more physical evidence of the theft.
translation: 可恶……[p/]他们没有找到更多关于盗窃的物证。

original: It looks like you've run into another dead end.
translation: 看起来你走进了另一个死胡同。

original: Unless...
translation: 除非……

original: Tyrion: Tracker.[p/] I saw you on the night of the murder.
translation: Tyrion: 追追。[p/]谋杀发生那晚我看见你了。

original: Liafal: W-What?!
translation: Liafal: 什、什么？！

original: Liafal: Tracker!
translation: Liafal: 追追！

original: Tracker: Ruh Roh.
translation: Tracker: 嗷呜。

original: Liafal: He's [i]supposed[/i] to stay in this room.
translation: Liafal: 他<u>应该</u>呆在房间里的。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why you won't allow the servants to enter it?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]<u>这就是</u>你不让仆人进房间的原因？

original: Liafal: I didn't [i]want[/i] to keep him in Beatrice's room,[p/] but he was very insistent that he stay here.
translation: Liafal: 我也<u>不想</u>让他待在比亚特丽丝的房间里，[p/]但他坚持要待在这里。

original: Tracker: Tracker likes the ambiance.
translation: Tracker: 追追喜欢这里的氛围。

original: Tyrion: ...Right.
translation: Tyrion: ……好吧。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] If you live in this room,[p/][s/] did [i]you[/i] see who brought the Sword of Spell Eating here?!
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]如果你在这个房间里，[p/][s/]<u>你</u>有看到是谁把噬法之剑带来吗？！

original: Liafal: I already asked him about that,[p/] but he didn't see anyone.
translation: Liafal: 我已经问过他了，[p/]但是他谁也没看见。

original: Liafal: He must have been taking a nap...
translation: Liafal: 他肯定是打了个盹儿……

original: Liafal: Either that or he was roaming outside even though I [i]told[/i] him to stay here!
translation: Liafal: 要么就是我<u>让</u>他待在房间里，他却去外面闲逛了！

original: Tracker: ...
translation: Tracker: ……

original: Tyrion: Damn it...
translation: Tyrion: 可恶……

original: Tracker: Tracker see a lot of other things, though.
translation: Tracker: 但是追追看到了很多别的。

original: Tracker: Tracker see many new people that night.
translation: Tracker: 追追那天晚上看到了很多新的人。

original: Right.[p/] He was roaming the manor during the Lords' Ball.[p/] He must have seen a lot of new people...
translation: 嗯。[p/]勋爵舞会期间他确实在庄园里闲逛。[p/]他肯定看到了很多不认识的人……

original: Wait...[p/] If he was walking around,[p/][s/] he might have seen something that the Inquisition doesn't know about!
translation: 等等……[p/]如果他在四处走动，[p/][s/]那他可能看到了裁判所不知道的事情！

original: Tyrion: Can you tell us what you saw on the night of the murder, Tracker?
translation: Tyrion: 你能告诉我们谋杀当晚你看到了什么吗，追追？

original: Tracker: Tracker see rats.
translation: Tracker: 追追看到了老鼠。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: This may be more difficult than you thought...
translation: 可能没你想得那么简单。

original: Tyrion: I need you to be more specific.
translation: Tyrion: 我希望你说得再具体些。

original: Tyrion: Can you go in order...?[p/] Tell me about everyone that you saw that night.
translation: Tyrion: 能按顺序来吗……？[p/]告诉我那天晚上你看到的每一个人。

original: Tracker: Mmmmm...[p/] Okay.
translation: Tracker: 嗯……[p/]好吧。

original: Tracker: Tracker was taking nap in room.[p/] But Tracker woke up from loud sounds outside.
translation: Tracker: 追追在房间里睡觉。[p/]但是追追被外面的声音吵醒了。

original: Tracker: Tracker hear small things running in the walls.
translation: Tracker: 追追听到有小东西在墙里跑。

original: Tyrion: "Running in the walls"?
translation: Tyrion: “在墙里跑？”

original: Tracker: Tracker called queen,[p/] but she didn't answer.[p/] So Tracker decided to check sound alone.
translation: Tracker: 追追喊女皇，[p/]但她没有回应。[p/]所以追追决定自己去检查声音。

original: Tracker: Tracker follow sound outside.[p/] That's when Tracker smell the bad smell.
translation: Tracker: 追追跟着声音追了出去。[p/]然后就闻到了难闻的味道。

original: Tyrion: "Bad smell"...?
translation: Tyrion: “难闻的味道”……？

original: Tracker: That's when Tracker smell flying rat.
translation: Tracker: 然后追追闻到了会飞的老鼠的味道。

original: Tyrion: You [i]smelled[/i] a "flying rat"?[p/] Did you mean like a pigeon?
translation: Tyrion: 你<u>闻到了</u>“会飞的老鼠”？[p/]你是说鸽子之类的吗？

original: Tracker: Tracker could smell where rat was,[p/] so Tracker bork at him.
translation: Tracker: 追追闻到了老鼠在哪儿，[p/]朝它大叫。

original: Tracker: Tracker must have scared rat.[p/] Because he fell onto the floor and dropped his stick.
translation: Tracker: 追追肯定吓到老鼠了。[p/]因为它摔在了地板上，还弄掉了他的棍子。

original: Tyrion: ...The rat had a stick?
translation: Tyrion: ……那只老鼠带着棍子？

original: Tracker: Tracker could see them now.[p/] So Tracker did one final bork to scare them off.
translation: Tracker: 追追看到它们了。[p/]然后追追大叫一声把它们吓跑了。

original: Tracker: The rats were scared and went back into the walls.
translation: Tracker: 老鼠非常害怕，又钻回墙里去了。

original: Tyrion: It went into the [i]walls[/i]?
translation: Tyrion: 它钻进<u>墙里</u>了？

original: Tracker: That's when Tracker picked up the stick rat dropped.
translation: Tracker: 然后追追就捡起了老鼠弄掉的棍子。

original: Tracker: Queen finally answered Tracker.[p/] She told him to go back to his room and hide.
translation: Tracker: 女皇最后回应了追追。[p/]她让追追回房间躲起来。

original: Tracker: After message,[p/] Tracker bring stick back to room for inspection.
translation: Tracker: 收到回应后，[p/]追追把棍子带回了房间进行检查。

original: Tyrion: Do you remember what time this encounter happened?
translation: Tyrion: 你还记得这是发生在什么时间吗？

original: Tracker: What is "time"?
translation: Tracker: 什么是“时间”？

original: Right...[p/] An animal wouldn't really have a concept of that...
translation: 好吧……[p/]动物没有那样的概念……

original: Tracker: Tracker like you, friend.[p/] You smell nice.
translation: Tracker: 追追喜欢你，朋友。[p/]你闻起来很棒。

original: Tyrion: Um...[p/] Thank you?
translation: Tyrion: 呃……[p/]谢谢你？

original: Celeste: What did he say?
translation: Celeste: 他刚说什么？

original: Tyrion: ...He told me that I smell nice.
translation: Tyrion: ……他说我闻起来很棒。

original: Celeste: Oh, yeah.[p/] I kind of see what he means.
translation: Celeste: 噢，好的。[p/]我大概明白他的意思。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Celeste: What?
translation: Celeste: 什么？

original: Tracker: My queen is a good friend.[p/] Saved Tracker when Tracker was pup.
translation: Tracker: 女皇是我的好朋友。[p/]她在追追小时候救了追追。

original: Tyrion: Is that how you ended up becoming her pet?
translation: Tyrion: 所以你最后成了她的宠物？

original: Tracker: Yeah.[p/] I always hear about other animals joining humans.[p/] But Tracker didn't understand until he met queen.
translation: Tracker: 对。[p/]我总是听说其他动物会和人类一起生活。[p/]但是直到追追遇到女皇才明白为什么。

original: Tracker: Now I gib queen protection.[p/] And queen gib me honey bacon.
translation: Tracker: 现在我负责保护女皇。[p/]女皇会给我甜甜的培根。

original: Tracker: Tracker don't like blue man.
translation: Tracker: 追追不喜欢蓝人。

original: Tyrion: "Blue man".[p/] Do you mean William Frega?
translation: Tyrion: “蓝人”。[p/]你是指威廉·弗雷加？

original: Tracker: Blue man always yells at queen.[p/] Makes her cry.
translation: Tracker: 蓝人总是对女皇大喊大叫。[p/]会让她哭。

original: Tyrion: I've never spoken to an animal before.[p/] I had no idea you could understand me.
translation: Tyrion: 我以前从来没和动物说过话。[p/]我不知道你能听懂我的话。

original: Tracker: Really?[p/] But you can speak fluent Dog.
translation: Tracker: 真的吗？[p/]但你的犬族语说得很流利。

original: The Eye of Horus must convey the intentions behind your words somehow.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼肯定是以某种方式传达了你话语背后的意图。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Tracker?
translation: Tyrion: 追追，你能告诉我些什么吗？

original: Tracker: Tracker don't-...
translation: Tracker: 追追没……

original: It looks like he got distracted by a squirrel outside.
translation: 他似乎被外面的一只松鼠吸引住了。

original: You enter Beatrice's bedroom and see the Inquisition combing through it.
translation: 你走进比亚特丽丝的卧室，看到裁判所的人正在仔细搜查。

original: It looks like their search is focused under her bed.
translation: 看起来他们搜查的重点是床底下。

original: Orym: Oh.[p/] Hey, kid.
translation: Orym: 噢。[p/]哟，小子。

original: Tyrion: Commander.
translation: Tyrion: 指挥官。

original: Orym: We're still doing a deep search of the room.[p/] But we're not done yet.
translation: Orym: 我们在对房间进行深度搜查。[p/]不过还没有完成。

original: Orym: You should probably come back later.
translation: Orym: 你可以稍后再来。

original: Orym: Keep it in that corner![p/][s/] Don't let it get away!
translation: Orym: 把它控制在角落里！[p/][s/]别让它跑了！

original: Liafal: ...Get away from him!
translation: Liafal: ……离他远点！

original: As you enter Beatrice's room,[p/] you see the Inquisition cornering something near the back of the room.
translation: 当你走进比亚特丽丝的房间时，[p/]你看到裁判所在房间里面围住了什么。

original: It's some sort of animal.[p/] A wolf to be exact.
translation: 某种动物。[p/]确切地说是一只狼。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Is that-?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]那是——？

original: You recall spotting that same wolf on the night of the Lords' Ball.
translation: 你记得勋爵舞会那晚也看到了这只狼。

original: Has it been in the house since the murder?
translation: 谋杀发生后它一直在房子里吗？

original: Tracker: ... [mind="Intruders! Must protect queen!"/]
translation: Tracker: …… [mind="是入侵者！要保护女皇！"/]

original: Tyrion: ...What?!
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？！

original: Did you just read his thoughts?!
translation: 你刚刚是读到了他的想法吗？

original: Tracker: ... [mind="Protect territory from enemies!"/]
translation: Tracker: …… [mind="保护领土不受敌人侵犯！"/]

original: He must see the Inquisition as intruders in his territory...
translation: 他一定是把裁判所视为了闯入领地的入侵者……

original: But does that mean he sees this room as his home?
translation: 但也就是说他把这个房间看作是他的家？

original: You slowly start to walk towards him.
translation: 你开始慢慢向他靠近。

original: Celeste: W-[p/][s/]Wait...[p/][s/] Tyrion?!
translation: Celeste: 等、[p/][s/]等等……[p/][s/]提利昂？！

original: Orym: Stay back, kid![p/][s/] It's a wild animal![p/][s/] There's no telling [i]what[/i] it'll do!
translation: Orym: 退后，小子！[p/][s/]这是头野兽！[p/][s/]谁也说不准它能干出<u>什么</u>事来！

original: You ignore them and continue to approach him.
translation: 你无视他们，继续向狼靠近。

original: Tyrion: ...Don't worry.[p/] I'm not here to hurt you.
translation: Tyrion: ……别担心。[p/]我不会伤害你的。

original: Tracker: Huh?[p/] This human...[p/] He can speak language of dog?
translation: Tracker: 嗯？[p/]这个人类……[p/]他会说犬族语？

original: Tyrion: Wait.[p/] You can understand me?
translation: Tyrion: 等下。[p/]你能听懂我在说什么？

original: Celeste: Why...[p/] are you talking to it?
translation: Celeste: 为什么……[p/]你在和它说话？

original: Tracker: You're speaking plain dog.[p/] Of course, Tracker understand.
translation: Tracker: 你说的是犬族语。[p/]追追当然能理解。

original: What's going on here?[p/] Is the Eye of Horus allowing you to speak with him?
translation: 到底怎么回事？[p/]是荷鲁斯之眼让你能和他交谈的吗？

original: You've never really tried it before.[p/] But perhaps your powers aren't limited to humans.
translation: 你之前从来没试过。[p/]不过或许你的能力并不只对人类有效。

original: Anyways...[p/] This could be a good opportunity...
translation: 总之……[p/]这是个好机会……

original: You wonder what else he knows.
translation: 你好奇他还知道些什么。

original: Celeste: What did he say, Tyrion?
translation: Celeste: 他刚说什么，提利昂？

original: Celeste: Did he see anything?
translation: Celeste: 他看见什么了吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Well, he definitely saw [i]something[/i].
translation: 唔，他肯定看到了<u>什么</u>。

original: Okay...[p/] Let's try to take a moment to work through this.
translation: 好了……[p/]花点时间仔细想想……

original: Tracker is an animal.[p/] And despite being able to speak with him,[p/] his use of words is very primitive.
translation: 追追是一只动物。[p/]尽管能够与它交谈，[p/]它的用词还是非常原始的。

original: So you should carefully examine each of his statements.
translation: 所以你需要仔细检查他的每一句话。

original: The first thing he heard was "small things running in the walls."
translation: 他首先听到了“小东西在墙里跑”。

original: You recall that someone else observed something similar that night.
translation: 你记得那天晚上还有别人看到了类似的事情。

original: No...[p/] Tracker heard "small things running in the walls."
translation: 不对……[p/]追追听到有“小东西在墙里跑”。

original: In the context of everything that happened that night,[p/] he must be talking about something specific.
translation: 根据那天晚上的情况，[p/]他一定是在说某件具体的事。

original: Didn't someone else mention hearing the same thing?
translation: 还有其他人听到了同样的动静吗？

original: Jan: The servants were complaining about rats running through the air vents.[p/] So they sent me to take care of it.
translation: Jan: 佣人们抱怨老鼠在通风管道里跑来跑去。[p/]所以他们让我去处理一下。

original: Jan: I heard one of them running in the vents upstairs.[p/] And I followed it here.
translation: Jan: 我听到其中一只在楼上的通风管道里跑。[p/]然后就跟着它来到了这里。

original: Jan: I figured it had nowhere else to go.[p/] So I opened it up and put a trap down.
translation: Jan: 我想它无路可走了。[p/]所以我打开了通风管道并设置了一个陷阱。

original: He must have heard the rats that Jan mentioned.
translation: 他肯定是听到了简提到的老鼠。

original: They weren't [i]actually[/i] running in the walls.[p/] They were running in the vents.
translation: 它们<u>实际上</u>并不是在墙里跑。[p/]而是在通风管道里跑。

original: The next thing he did was "call the queen".[p/] But she didn't answer.
translation: 接下来他做的事情是“呼叫女皇”。[p/]但是她没有回应。

original: The "queen" that he's referring to is probably Laefe.[p/] But Laefe wasn't with him at the time.
translation: 他所指的“女皇”很可能是拉菲。[p/]但是拉菲当时没有和他在一起。

original: He must have called out to her telepathically.
translation: 他肯定是通过心灵感应呼喊她的。

original: No...[p/] Laefe clearly didn't want Tracker to leave the room.
translation: 不……[p/]显然拉菲不想让追追离开房间。

original: If he contacted her,[p/] she would have said [i]something[/i] in response.
translation: 如果他联系了拉菲，[p/]她肯定会有所回应。

original: So something else must have happened.
translation: 因此肯定是发生了些别的。

original: Laefe didn't respond because she never got Tracker's message.
translation: 拉菲没有回应，是因为她没有收到追追的消息。

original: The telepathic capabilities granted by [b]Familial Bond[/b] were disabled by the [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: [b]使魔契约[/b]赋予他们的心灵感应能力被[b]抗魔力场[/b]无效化了。

original: ...Which means that this encounter happened [i]during[/i] the lockdown.
translation: ……也就是说这件事发生在<u>封锁期间</u>。

original: So that covers his first two statements.[p/] But you're not really sure what to make of the "flying rat" he saw...
translation: 他的前两句话就这些。[p/]但是你不太确定该如何理解他看到的“会飞的老鼠”……

original: Tyrion: Tracker,[p/] why did you refer to the rat as "flying"?
translation: Tyrion: 追追，[p/]为什么你说老鼠“会飞”？

original: Tracker: Because rats don't usually jump and fly.
translation: Tracker: 因为老鼠通常不会跳也不会飞。

original: Tyrion: Yes.[p/] I got that...
translation: Tyrion: 确实。[p/]我知道了……

original: Tyrion: Is it possible that what you saw wasn't really a rat?
translation: Tyrion: 你看到的东西会不会不是老鼠？

original: Tracker: Rats are rats.[p/] They're small things that run and hide.
translation: Tracker: 老鼠就是老鼠。[p/]它们是会跑会躲的小东西。

original: Hm...[p/] So "rat" is a general term for him.[p/] He uses it to refer to small animals that are acting suspiciously.
translation: 呃……[p/]所以“老鼠”对他来说可以泛指。[p/]他用这个词来指代行为可疑的小动物。

original: Anyways,[p/] with everything you know now,[p/] his last statement doesn't make sense.
translation: 总之，[p/]基于你目前已知的事实，[p/]他最后一句话是说不通的。

original: He said that the "queen finally answered" him.[p/] And this happened after he picked up the "stick".
translation: 他说“女皇最终回应了”他。[p/]而那是在他捡起“棍子”之后发生的。

original: But that shouldn't have been possible due to the [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b].
translation: 但由于[b]抗魔力场[/b]的存在，那应该是不可能的。

original: No...[p/] Laefe told Tracker to go back to his room.
translation: 不……[p/]拉菲确实让追追回他的房间了。

original: His attempts to contact her failed previously because of the lockdown system.
translation: 他之前试图联系她，但是因为封锁系统而失败了。

original: But something changed that allowed him to hear her.
translation: 不过某些变化发生后，他能够听到拉菲的声音了。

original: You recall that he picked up a "stick" before receiving her message.
translation: 你记得在收到拉菲的回应之前，他捡起了一根“棍子”。

original: Tyrion: ...Tracker.[p/] About that "stick" you found...
translation: Tyrion: ……追追。[p/]关于你找到的那根“棍子”……

original: Tyrion: Where did you put it after you came back to this room?
translation: Tyrion: 回房间后你把它放在哪里了？

original: Tracker: Tracker hide stick in safe space.[p/] Under the bed.
translation: Tracker: 追追把它藏在了安全的地方。[p/]床底下。

original: Tyrion: ...And this "stick".[p/] Did it look like the sword that my friend is carrying?
translation: Tyrion: ……而这根“棍子”。[p/]它看起来像我朋友带着的那把剑吗？

original: Celeste: ...What?
translation: Celeste: ……什么？

original: Tracker: Hey![p/][s/] Your friend stole my other stick!
translation: Tracker: 喂！[p/][s/]你的朋友偷了我的另一根棍子！

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Your "[i]other[/i]" stick?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]你的“<u>另一根</u>”棍子？

original: Tracker: Yeah![p/][s/] Tracker found it while he was hiding from the metal men.
translation: Tracker: 对！[p/][s/]追追在躲避金属人的时候发现了它。

original: "Metal men"...?[p/] Is he referring to the Kingsguard?
translation: “金属人”……？[p/]他指的是国王卫队吗？

original: He must have left the bedroom when they were searching for the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: 他们寻找噬法之剑的时候，追追肯定已经离开了卧室。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] Are [i]you[/i] the one who stole Celeste's sword?
translation: Tyrion: 等等……[p/]所以是<u>你</u>偷了塞莱斯特的剑？

original: Liafal: Tracker!
translation: Liafal: 追追！

original: Tracker: Did Tracker do a bad...?
translation: Tracker: 追追做了坏……？

original: Tyrion: It's as I suspected...
translation: Tyrion: 如我所料……

original: Tyrion: [i]Tracker[/i] was the one that brought the Sword of Spell Eating here.
translation: Tyrion: 是<u>追追</u>把噬法之剑带到房间里的。

original: Liafal: What?!
translation: Liafal: 什么？！

original: Tyrion: I have no idea how or why.[p/] But the Sword of Spell Eating was lying in a hallway somewhere.
translation: Tyrion: 我不知道怎么回事，也不知道为什么。[p/]但是噬法之剑当时应该落在某个走廊里。

original: Tyrion: Tracker found it and brought it back to Beatrice's room,[p/] [i]his[/i] room.
translation: Tyrion: 追追发现了它，并把它带回了比亚特丽丝的房间，[p/]也是<u>他的</u>房间。

original: Liafal: That can't be...[p/] So the person who framed Beatrice for the theft was...
translation: Liafal: 不可能……[p/]所以陷害比亚特丽丝偷窃的人是……

original: Tracker: ...
translation: Tracker: ……

original: If it weren't for Tracker,[p/] the Inquisition would've never honed in on Beatrice at all.
translation: 如果不是因为追追，[p/]裁判所根本不会盯上比亚特丽丝。

original: But why would the Sword of Spell Eating be lying in a random hallway?
translation: 可是为什么噬法之剑会落在走廊里呢？

original: Tyrion: Laefe.[p/] Do you mind if I borrow Tracker for a little bit?
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲。[p/]你介意我借用追追一会儿吗？

original: Liafal: I...
translation: Liafal: 我……

original: Tracker: It's okay, queen.[p/] He smell good.[p/] Tracker trust him.
translation: Tracker: 没关系，女皇。[p/]他闻起来很棒。[p/]追追相信他。

original: Tyrion: Thanks...[p/] I guess?
translation: Tyrion: 我猜我该说……[p/]谢谢？

original: Liafal: ...Okay.[p/] But only if you allow me to accompany you.
translation: Liafal: ……好吧。[p/]但前提是允许我陪你一起去。

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: You know about Miriam's position.[p/] But how does Laefe feel about you prosecuting Beatrice?
translation: 你知道米莉亚姆的立场。[p/]但是拉菲对你起诉比亚特丽丝会有什么看法？

original: It's possible she might try to sabotage the investigation if you let her accompany you...
translation: 如果答应让她陪同的话，她可能会试图干扰调查……

original: But as Tracker's owner,[p/] you don't really have a choice.
translation: 但她是追追的主人，[p/]你别无选择。

original: You nod to Laefe.[p/] But you also send a subtle gesture to Celeste to keep an eye on her.
translation: 你向拉菲点头示意。[p/]但同时你向塞莱斯特做了一个细微的手势，让她留意拉菲。

original: She silently nods and slowly follows behind her.
translation: 她默默点头，然后慢慢地跟在拉菲身后。

original: Tyrion: Alright,[p/] Tracker.[p/] Can you take us to the hallway where you found these rats?
translation: Tyrion: 好了，[p/]追追。[p/]你能带我们去你发现那些老鼠的走廊吗？

original: Tracker: Sure thing, King.
translation: Tracker: 当然可以，国王。

original: ...It looks like you've received a promotion.
translation: ……看起来你升职了。

original: JUDGE: Court is now in session for the trial of Beatrice Frega.
translation: JUDGE: 法庭现在开庭，审理比亚特丽丝·弗雷加案。

original: Judge: Ms. Steelwind?[p/] Is the prosecution ready?
translation: Judge: 斯蒂尔文德女士？[p/]检方是否准备就绪？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Judge: ...Ms. Steelwind?
translation: Judge: ……斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Aria: O-[p/][s/]Oh, of course.
translation: Aria: 噢、[p/][s/]噢，当然。

original: ARIA: The prosecution is ready, Your Honor.
translation: ARIA: 检方已准备就绪，法官阁下。

original: Ruby: ...The defense is also ready, Your Honor.
translation: Ruby: ……辩方也准备好了，法官阁下。

original: Something seems off about her today...
translation: 她今天似乎有点不对劲……

original: Is her personal attachment to this case distracting her?
translation: 是她的个人感情分散了她的注意力吗？

original: JUDGE: ...Very well.[p/] Let’s begin the proceedings.
translation: JUDGE: ……很好。[p/]让我们继续吧。

original: JUDGE: Prosecutor Steelwind,[p/] could you please list the charges?
translation: JUDGE: 检察官斯蒂尔文德，[p/]能请你列出指控吗？

original: Aria: Your Honor.[p/] The defendant is charged with first-degree murder and grand theft.
translation: Aria: 法官阁下。[p/]被告被控一级谋杀罪和重大盗窃罪。

original: Aria: As many of you know,[p/] Beatrice Frega is the formerly missing daughter of the now-late William Frega.
translation: Aria: 众所周知，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加是已故威廉·弗雷加曾经失踪的女儿。

original: Aria: And the [i]victim[/i] of the murder is William Frega himself.
translation: Aria: 而谋杀案的<u>受害者</u>正是威廉·弗雷加。

original: Judge: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...[p/] I'm well aware of that...
translation: Judge: 是、[p/][s/]是的……[p/]我了解这些……

original: Judge: The people of Wyverngarde will certainly mourn the loss of House Frega's head.
translation: Judge: 维文加德的人民定会为弗雷加家族领主的逝去而哀悼。

original: Please.[p/] The only people "mourning" him are the banking houses' shareholders.
translation: 拜托。[p/]唯一会为他“哀悼”的人是银行股东。

original: Judge: But anyways,[p/] did you also say that the defendant is accused of grand theft?
translation: Judge: 总之，[p/]你还说被告被指控犯有重大盗窃罪？

original: Aria: Yes, Your Honor.
translation: Aria: 没错，法官阁下。

original: Aria: The crimes took place during the Lords' Ball,[p/] an event that was hosted in Frega Manor yesterday evening.
translation: Aria: 罪行发生在勋爵舞会期间，[p/]那是昨天晚上在弗雷加庄园举办的一场活动。

original: Aria: The Haroldson Hall of History had a gallery display within the manor.
translation: Aria: 哈罗德森历史长廊在庄园内举办了一个画廊展览。

original: Aria: They were showcasing several magical artifacts donated to the Wyverngarde Historical Society.
translation: Aria: 正展示捐赠给维文加德历史学会的几件魔法遗物。

original: Aria: One of these items was the "Sword of Spell Eating":[p/] a magical artifact that allows its wielder to nullify magical effects.
translation: Aria: 其中一件是“噬法之剑”：[p/]一件能让持有者免疫魔法效果的魔法遗物。

original: Aria: We, the prosecution, believe that the defendant stole this item.
translation: Aria: 我们，即检方，认为被告偷了这件遗物。

original: Aria: She then used it to nullify the magical lock on the victim's Study.
translation: Aria: 然后被告用它打开了受害者书房的附魔锁。

original: Aria: After breaking into the Study,[p/] she attacked the victim and slashed his throat open using a letter opener.
translation: Aria: 闯入书房后，[p/]她袭击了受害者，并用拆信刀割开了他的喉咙。

original: Aria: He died of blood loss shortly after.
translation: Aria: 受害者很快死于失血过多。

original: Judge: I-[p/]I see...[p/] But what possible motive would the defendant have to murder her own father?
translation: Judge: 我、[p/]我知道了……[p/]但被告有什么动机谋杀自己的父亲呢？

original: Aria: William Frega and his daughter were not close.[p/] Saying that they had a strained relationship would be an understatement.
translation: Aria: 威廉·弗雷加和他的女儿关系并不亲密。[p/]说他们关系紧张，算是轻描淡写。

original: Aria: In fact,[p/] five years prior to the murder,[p/] Beatrice abandoned and fled her home.
translation: Aria: 事实上，[p/]在谋杀发生的五年前，[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加就抛弃并逃离了弗雷加家族。

original: Aria: She went into hiding and did not contact any of her friends or family.
translation: Aria: 她藏了起来，不与任何朋友或家人联系。

original: Aria: Her whereabouts were unknown...[p/] [i]until[/i] she suddenly contacted her father a week ago.
translation: Aria: 她一直下落不明……[p/]<u>直到</u>一周前她突然联系了自己的父亲。

original: Ruby: My client left the Frega household because of her toxic relationship with her father.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人因与父亲关系不好离开了弗雷加一族。

original: Ruby: She wanted to create a life for herself that was free from his influence and abuse.
translation: Ruby: 她想要摆脱父亲的影响和虐待，为自己而活。

original: Aria: ...I won't disagree with your claims.
translation: Aria: ……我不反对你的论点。

original: Aria: But that just highlights how desperate the defendant must have been.
translation: Aria: 但这恰恰凸显了被告当时有多绝望。

original: Aria: She had clearly fallen on hard times and begrudgingly contacted her father for financial aid.
translation: Aria: 显然她陷入了困境，不得不联系她的父亲寻求经济援助。

original: Aria: I can't possibly understand why they would schedule this meeting [i]during[/i] the Lords' Ball.
translation: Aria: 我实在无法理解他们为什么要在勋爵舞会<u>期间</u>安排这次会面。

original: Aria: But nevertheless,[p/] several witnesses [i]did[/i] see her that night.
translation: Aria: 但无论如何，[p/]<u>确实</u>有目击者在当晚看到了她。

original: Aria: And these same witnesses saw her storming out of her father's study in anger.
translation: Aria: 而这些目击者也看到了她愤怒地冲出威廉·弗雷加的书房。

original: Aria: Her father must have refused her request for gold.[p/] So she decided to murder him to claim his inheritance.
translation: Aria: 她的父亲想必是拒绝了她索要黄金的要求。[p/]所以她决定谋杀他以继承遗产。

original: Beatrice: Luckily,[p/] we prepared for this in advance.
translation: Beatrice: 幸运的是，[p/]我们早有准备。

original: Ruby: Yes.[p/] They're playing right into our hands.
translation: Ruby: 是啊。[p/]正中我们下怀。

original: Ruby: ...What you're saying is all conjecture, Steelwind.
translation: Ruby: ……你所说的都只是猜测，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Ruby: You don't have [i]any[/i] evidence or testimony that confirms what they spoke about.
translation: Ruby: 你没有<u>任何</u>证据或证词来确认他们谈话的内容。

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] I'm well aware that you [i]and[/i] your client have refused to tell us what was discussed during that meeting.
translation: Aria: 是的。[p/]我很清楚你<u>和</u>你的委托人都拒绝告诉我们那次会面讨论的内容。

original: Aria: But as long as you both stay silent,[p/] my claims are plausible.
translation: Aria: 但只要你们都保持沉默，[p/]那么我的主张就有一定的合理性。

original: Ruby: ...Be honest, Steelwind.[p/] Do you seriously think that my client committed these crimes in [i]spite[/i] of her condition?
translation: Ruby: ……坦白说，斯蒂尔文德。[p/]了解我的委托人的情况之后，你还是认为她犯下了那些罪行吗？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Judge: ..."Condition"?[p/] What do you mean by that, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Judge: ……“情况”？[p/]泰摩拉女士，这是什么意思？

original: Ruby: Why don't [i]you[/i] tell him, Steelwind?
translation: Ruby: 不如<u>你</u>来向法官阁下说明吧，斯蒂尔文德？

original: Ruby: Tell the court about my client's disability.
translation: Ruby: 向法庭说明我的委托人的残疾情况。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: ...Your Honor.[p/] Beatrice Frega [i]is[/i] considered legally disabled.[p/] However-
translation: Aria: ……法官阁下。[p/]比亚特丽丝·弗雷加<u>属于</u>法定残疾人士。[p/]但是——

original: Ruby: "Legally disabled"?[p/] That's a [i]convenient[/i] way of putting it, Steelwind.
translation: Ruby: “法定残疾”？[p/]说起来<u>轻巧</u>，斯蒂尔文德。

original: Ruby: My client isn't just "legally disabled".
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人不仅仅是“法定残疾”。

original: Ruby: She's completely blind!
translation: Ruby: 她是完全失明的！

original: Judge: Completely blind...?[p/] Is this true?
translation: Judge: 完全失明……？[p/]这是真的吗？

original: Ruby: We have several medical documents [i]and[/i] testimony from several chirurgeons attesting to that fact.
translation: Ruby: 我们有几份医疗文件<u>以及</u>几位外科医生的证词，可以证明这一事实。

original: Ruby: My client is unable to see [i]anything[/i].
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人<u>什么</u>也看不见。

original: Judge: What is the meaning of this, Ms. Steelwind?!
translation: Judge: 这是什么意思，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Judge: Do you expect me to believe that a [i]blind[/i] woman performed any of the acts you're accusing her of?
translation: Judge: 你期望我相信一个<u>失明</u>的女人犯下了你所指控的罪行吗？

original: Ruby: I'm glad you [i]also[/i] see how ridiculous these claims are, Your Honor.
translation: Ruby: 很高兴你<u>也</u>能看出这些指控有多么荒谬，法官阁下。

original: Aria: I-[p/][s/]If the court would just let me elaborate-
translation: Aria: 如、[p/][s/]如果法庭能让我详细说明——

original: Ruby: Steelwind.[p/] The prosecution's first charge is grand theft.
translation: Ruby: 斯蒂尔文德。[p/]检方的第一项指控是重大盗窃罪。

original: Ruby: My client would have needed to break into a [i]magically[/i] secured display case.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人必须破坏一个有<u>魔法</u>防护的展示柜。

original: Ruby: Performing such an act would be a difficult task for [i]anyone[/i],[p/] much less my client.
translation: Ruby: 对<u>任何人</u>来说，想要做到这件事都很困难，[p/]更不用说我的委托人了。

original: Aria: I-
translation: Aria: 我——

original: Ruby: And the [i]second[/i] charge is first-degree murder.
translation: Ruby: 第<u>二</u>项指控是一级谋杀罪。

original: Ruby: My client would have needed to use the Sword of Spell Eating on the lock leading to the victim's study.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人需要用噬法之剑打开受害者书房的锁。

original: Ruby: [i]Then[/i] she would have needed to grab a letter opener,[p/] overpower the victim,[p/] [i]and[/i] deliver a precise and fatal blow to the victim's neck.
translation: Ruby: <u>然后</u>她需要拿起一把拆信刀，[p/]制服受害者，[p/]<u>并</u>对受害者的颈部给予精准且致命的一击。

original: Ruby: Does [i]any[/i] of that sound like a reasonable theory, Your Honor?
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，这里有<u>任何</u>一项像是我的委托人能做到的吗？

original: Judge: I'm compelled to agree with you, Ms. Tymora...
translation: Judge: 我不得不同意你的观点，泰摩拉女士……

original: Judge: It all sounds quite ludicrous,[p/] to be perfectly honest.
translation: Judge: 说实话，[p/]这一切都听起来很荒谬。

original: Gallery: This is just awful.
translation: Gallery: 太糟糕了。

original: Gallery: The Steelwinds are clearly just attacking the Fregas now that their head is deceased.
translation: Gallery: 明显是因为弗雷加勋爵现在去世了，所以斯蒂尔文德家族在攻击弗雷加家族。

original: Aria: Enough!
translation: Aria: 够了！

original: Aria: Your Honor.[p/] The court has [i]not[/i] seen the evidence that supports this case.
translation: Aria: 法官阁下，[p/]法庭还<u>没有</u>看到支持此案的证据。

original: Aria: Nor have you listened to the Inquisition's testimony regarding their investigation.
translation: Aria: 也没有听取裁判所相关调查的证词。

original: Aria: Until you have done so,[p/] you are in no position to pass judgment.
translation: Aria: 在这一切完成前，[p/]你不能下达判决。

original: Judge: ...Very well, Ms. Steelwind.[p/] I suppose you have a point.
translation: Judge: ……很好，斯蒂尔文德女士。[p/]我认为你说的有道理。

original: Hmph.[p/] Guess the young lady has some claws after all.
translation: 哼。[p/]看来这位年轻的女士终究还是有些厉害之处。

original: But it doesn't matter,[p/] their case against Beatrice is questionable at best.
translation: 但这无关紧要，[p/]因为他们对比亚特丽丝的指控再怎么样也站不住脚。

original: Frankly,[p/] it's surprising that Steelwind even went through with this.
translation: 坦白说，[p/]斯蒂尔文德的举动实在令人吃惊。

original: It's only a matter of time before the judge sees things your way.
translation: 法官迟早会站在你这边的。

original: Aria: To begin,[p/] the prosecution would like to call Commander Orym White to the stand.
translation: Aria: 首先，[p/]检方希望传唤指挥官奥蒙·怀特出庭作证。

original: ARIA: Commander White,[p/] please testify to the court about the Inquisition’s findings.
translation: ARIA: 怀特指挥官，[p/]请向法庭就裁判所的发现作证。

original: ORYM: Right…
translation: ORYM: 好……

original: Orym: We didn't want to cause panic after the Sword was stolen.[p/] So we activated the manor's silent security system.[p/] It put an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] over the entire manor.
translation: Orym: 噬法之剑被偷后，我们不想引起恐慌。[p/]所以启动了庄园的无声安全系统。[p/]在整个庄园上方设置了一个[b]抗魔力场[/b]。

original: Orym: We did a search of the house.[p/] And we found the stolen sword in the defendant's bedroom.
translation: Orym: 我们搜查了房子。[p/]并在被告的卧室里找到了被盗的剑。

original: Orym: It didn't look like she was going to run,[p/] and Crown Prince Aster told us to stand down.[p/] So we just kept a close eye on her.
translation: Orym: 她看起来并不打算逃跑，[p/]而且阿斯特王储殿下让我们解除戒备。[p/]所以我们只是密切监视着她。

original: Orym: William Frega was in a bad mood that night.[p/] So he had already locked himself inside his study.
translation: Orym: 威廉·弗雷加那天晚上心情不好。[p/]所以就把自己锁在书房里了。

original: Orym: But an hour later,[p/] we entered the Study and found him lying dead in a pool of blood.
translation: Orym: 但一个小时后，[p/]我们进入书房，发现他躺在血泊中死了。

original: Orym: The lock was still engaged,[p/] and no one teleported in.[p/] The perp must've temporarily disabled the lock using the Sword of Spell Eating.
translation: Orym: 锁仍然处于锁定状态，[p/]也没有人传送进来。[p/]因此罪犯一定是用噬法之剑暂时解除了锁的状态。

original: Orym: We have testimonies that say the defendant was seriously in debt.[p/] She must have murdered the victim to get a part of his inheritance.
translation: Orym: 我们有证词表明被告负债累累。[p/]她一定是为了得到受害者部分遗产而谋杀了他。

original: Hmph...[p/] Their case against Beatrice is just as you predicted.
translation: 嗯……[p/]他们对比亚特丽丝的指控完全如你所料。

original: And you already have a countermeasure to disprove the existence of any motive.
translation: 而你已经有可以反驳所有动机的对策了。

original: All you have to do is PRESENT that to the court.
translation: 你只需要向法庭 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 证据就行了。

original: Ruby: ...Wait, doesn't the Sword make the wielder immune to magical effects?
translation: Ruby: ……等下，噬法之剑不是能让使用者免疫魔法效果吗？

original: Ruby: An [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] would've only disempowered everyone [i]except[/i] the thief.
translation: Ruby: [b]抗魔力场[/b]只会让小偷<u>以外</u>的所有人失去能力。

original: Orym: Yeah, well...[p/] We didn't know what the Sword could do until [i]after[/i] the investigation.
translation: Orym: 是的，呃……[p/]经过调查<u>后</u>我们才知道了这把剑的作用。

original: Orym: Up until then,[p/] we thought it was just a dusty old artifact.
translation: Orym: 在那之前，[p/]我们还以为它只是一件布满灰尘的老旧遗物。

original: Ruby: That seems pretty negligent.[p/] Are you sure you're qualified for your position, Orym?
translation: Ruby: 听起来也太疏忽大意了。[p/]你确定自己能胜任目前的职位吗，奥蒙？

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Aria: The situation was unprecedented for everyone involved.
translation: Aria: 这样的情况对于所有相关人员来说都是前所未有的。

original: Aria: One could hardly expect an ancient artifact to have magical capabilities.
translation: Aria: 人们很难预料到一件远古遗物会有魔法能力。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Aria: Anyways,[p/] what did you do after the theft, Commander?
translation: Aria: 无论如何，[p/]指挥官，盗窃案发生后你做了什么？

original: Ruby: That seems like a strange conclusion to jump to.
translation: Ruby: 这样的结论似乎有些奇怪。

original: Ruby: My client hadn't stepped foot into the Frega Manor in years.
translation: Ruby: 我的委托人已经多年没有踏足弗雷加庄园了。

original: Ruby: After being gone for so long,[p/] her bedroom [i]had[/i] to have been repurposed for something else.
translation: Ruby: 既然她离开了这么久，[p/]那她的卧室<u>肯定</u>已经改作他用了。

original: Orym: I'm not sure about the details,[p/] but one of the defendant's sisters refused to let the servants disturb that room.
translation: Orym: 具体我不确定，[p/]但被告的妹妹之一禁止仆人们进入那个房间。

original: Orym: I guess she was hoping that her sister would come back one day.
translation: Orym: 我想她一直期盼着她的姐姐哪天会回来。

original: Beatrice: Laefe...
translation: Beatrice: 拉菲……

original: Ruby: And why would the prince tell you to stand down, Orym?
translation: Ruby: 那么王子为什么会让你退下呢，奥蒙？

original: Orym: W-[p/][s/]Well...
translation: Orym: 因、[p/][s/]因为……

original: Aria: Crown Prince Aster knew the defendant well.[p/] He was confident that she wasn't going to flee the scene.
translation: Aria: 阿斯特王储殿下很了解被告。[p/]他确信被告不会逃离现场。

original: Ruby: Are you sure he just "knew her well"?
translation: Ruby: 你确定他只是“很了解”被告吗？

original: Ruby: If I recall correctly,[p/] the prince is still very adamant about her innocence.
translation: Ruby: 如果我没记错的话，[p/]王子还坚信她是无辜的。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Judge: The Crown Prince is vouching for the defendant?
translation: Judge: 王储殿下曾为被告担保吗？

original: Judge: Is this true, Ms. Steelwind?
translation: Judge: 这属实吗，斯蒂尔文德女士？

original: Aria: ...It is.[p/] However,[p/] I believe that the evidence found throughout the investigation proves the contrary.
translation: Aria: ……属实。[p/]然而，[p/]我认为整个调查过程中发现的证据证明被告并不无辜。

original: Ruby: Are you sure your judgment isn't simply being clouded by your jealousy?
translation: Ruby: 你确定你的判断不是被自己的嫉妒心所蒙蔽了吗？

original: Ruby: Your fiancé [i]was[/i] previously engaged to my client, after all.
translation: Ruby: 毕竟你的未婚夫<u>之前</u>和我的委托人订过婚。

original: Orym: ...
translation: Orym: ……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Beatrice: You're enjoying this a bit too much...
translation: Beatrice: 你有点太乐在其中了……

original: Ruby: Did anyone see him enter the study?
translation: Ruby: 有人看到他走进书房了吗？

original: Orym: A few people.[p/] One of them was Laefe Frega:[p/] the victim's second daughter.
translation: Orym: 有的。[p/]其中就包括了拉菲·弗雷加，[p/]也就是受害者的二女儿。

original: Orym: She said that he was really irritated that night.[p/] So he went into his study for some peace and quiet.
translation: Orym: 她说受害者那天晚上确实很生气。[p/]所以才走进书房寻个清静。

original: Orym: I guess his meeting with the defendant put him in a bad mood.
translation: Orym: 我认为是与被告的会面导致了他的坏心情。

original: Ruby: But if the manor was covered in an [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b],[p/] how did he lock the door magically?
translation: Ruby: 可是如果庄园被[b]抗魔力场[/b]覆盖了，[p/]那他是怎么用魔法锁上门的呢？

original: Orym: I'm not sure how.[p/] But the locks in the manor aren't affected by [b]Anti-Magic Fields[/b].
translation: Orym: 我不太确定他是怎么做到的。[p/]但是庄园里的锁不受[b]抗魔力场[/b]的影响。

original: Ruby: Um...[p/] How?
translation: Ruby: 啊……[p/]怎么回事？

original: Aria: The magical locks generate a smaller [b]Anti-Magic Field[/b] around themselves.
translation: Aria: 附魔锁在自身周围生成了一个较小的[b]抗魔力场[/b]。

original: Aria: The two fields cancel each other out.[p/] It's like multiplying two negative numbers together.
translation: Aria: 两个[b]抗魔力场[/b]相互抵消了。[p/]就像负负得正。

original: Ruby: I'm going to be honest.[p/] I have no understanding of these things.
translation: Ruby: 说实话，[p/]我对这些事情一无所知。

original: Ruby: Is what she's saying true, Beatrice?
translation: Ruby: 她说的是真的吗，比亚特丽丝？

original: Beatrice: Yes.[p/] Overlapping [b]Anti-Magic Fields[/b] are a well-studied phenomenon.
translation: Beatrice: 是。[p/]重叠的[b]抗魔力场[/b]是已被充分研究的现象。

original: You'll just have to take her word for it...
translation: 你只能相信她的话……

original: Ruby: Who was the person that discovered the body?
translation: Ruby: 是谁发现了尸体？

original: Orym: The same person who saw him last.[p/] His daughter:[p/] Laefe Frega.
translation: Orym: 最后一个见到他的人。[p/]她的女儿，[p/]拉菲·弗雷加。

original: Beatrice: ...Poor Laefe.[p/] That must have been traumatizing for her.
translation: Beatrice: ……可怜的拉菲。[p/]那对她来说一定很痛苦。

original: Ruby: ...Did anyone else accompany Laefe when she happened upon the body?
translation: Ruby: ……拉菲突然发现尸体时，有其他人和她一起吗？

original: Orym: Yeah.[p/] Supposedly,[p/] one of the servants got himself locked in a nearby storage closet.
translation: Orym: 有的。[p/]据说，[p/]有个仆人把自己锁在了附近的一个储藏室里。

original: Orym: And he heard the violent attack through one of the air vents.
translation: Orym: 并且他通过某个通风管道听到了激烈的攻击声。

original: Orym: When he finally got out,[p/] he told Laefe and they went into the study accompanied by some knights.
translation: Orym: 他出来后，[p/]把这件事告诉了拉菲，然后他们在一些骑士的陪同下走进了书房。

original: Ruby: This sword is integral to the case against my client.[p/] So why is the description of its capabilities so vague?
translation: Ruby: 这把剑对于我的委托人的案子来说至关重要。[p/]为什么对其能力的描述如此模糊呢？

original: Orym: To be honest,[p/] the Sword [i]is[/i] magic.[p/] But it doesn't seem to behave like any spells we know about.
translation: Orym: 老实说，[p/]这把剑<u>确实</u>附有魔法。[p/]但与我们已知的任何魔法都不尽相同。

original: Orym: And we can't identify its magic like we usually do with artificery devices.
translation: Orym: 并且我们无法像往常一样，用奥术能源装置识别它的魔法。

original: Orym: ...According to Lord Haroldson,[p/] its powers are "demonic" in nature.
translation: Orym: ……据哈罗德森勋爵所说，[p/]它的魔力本质上来自“恶魔”。

original: Orym: But if you ask me,[p/] it's all a bunch of hooey.
translation: Orym: 但要我说，[p/]他就是在胡言乱语。

original: Beatrice: ...
translation: Beatrice: ……

original: Orym: Anyways,[p/] it's obvious that it doesn't follow the normal rules of magic.
translation: Orym: 总之，[p/]它很明显不符合正常的魔法规则。

original: Ruby: Wait...[p/][s/] What?
translation: Ruby: 等等……[p/][s/]什么？

original: Judge: What is it, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Judge: 怎么了，泰摩拉女士？

original: Ruby: I-[p/][s/]It's nothing.
translation: Ruby: 没、[p/][s/]没什么。

original: Cuthbert is watching from the gallery.[p/] So he must have heard that too.
translation: 卡斯伯特正在旁听席上观看庭审。[p/]所以他肯定也听到了那句话。

original: Could the Eye of Horus have something to do with demons?
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼会和恶魔有什么关系吗？

original: ...No.[p/] Focus on acquitting the client, first.[p/] You can worry about Cuthbert later.
translation: ……不行。[p/]先集中注意力为委托人进行无罪辩护。[p/]之后再担心卡斯伯特。

original: Aria: Either way,[p/] we've tested the Sword's magic on similar locks.
translation: Aria: 总之，[p/]我们已经在类似的锁上测试过噬法之剑的魔法了。

original: Aria: When used correctly,[p/] it [i]is[/i] capable of disabling the lock on Lord Frega's study.
translation: Aria: 如果操作得当，[p/]它就<u>能</u>打开弗雷加勋爵书房的锁。

original: Ruby: You have "testimonies"?
translation: Ruby: 你有“证词”吗？

original: Ruby: Wouldn't an official record be more valid evidence?
translation: Ruby: 官方记录不是更有效的证据吗？

original: Aria: ...Ms. Tymora.[p/] You and I [i]both[/i] know that your client's creditors are not the type to keep such records.
translation: Aria: ……泰摩拉女士，[p/]我们<u>都</u>知道，你的委托人的债主不是那种会保留官方记录的人。

original: Ruby: So you're admitting that you're relying on hearsay.
translation: Ruby: 也就是说你承认自己在依赖传闻。

original: Aria: One [i]could[/i] conclude that.
translation: Aria: 确实<u>可以</u>得出这样的结论。

original: Aria: But it doesn't matter if we can prove that this debt exists.[p/] The Frega estate is unimaginably vast.
translation: Aria: 但关键不是能否证明这笔债务存在。[p/]因为弗雷加的产业庞大，难以想象。

original: Aria: Debt or no debt,[p/] that amount of wealth would be a tempting boon to any individual.
translation: Aria: 无论负债与否，[p/]这笔财富都是非常诱人的。

original: She has a point.[p/] House Frega owns all of the banking houses in Wyverngarde.
translation: 她说得有道理。[p/]弗雷加家族拥有维文加德所有的银行机构。

original: People can only dream of having that much power and wealth.
translation: 人们做梦都想拥有那样的权力和财富。

original: The prosecution's case against Beatrice is already really weak.
translation: 检方对比亚特丽丝的指控是非常无力的。

original: You're not even sure why they bothered bringing this to trial in the first place.
translation: 你甚至不知道他们当初为什么要提交庭审。

original: And you already have testimony from someone else that directly contradicts the commander's testimony.
translation: 而且你还有能反驳指挥官证词的证人。

original: Once you PRESENT that to the court,[p/] this case is as good as yours.
translation: 一旦你向法庭 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 这一证据，[p/]就能稳操胜券。

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] The witness's testimony contradicts [i]this[/i] piece of evidence.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]证人的证词与<u>这份</u>证据相矛盾。

original: Judge: My apologies, Ms. Tymora...
translation: Judge: 抱歉，泰摩拉女士……

original: Judge: But I fail to see [i]any[/i] contradiction there.
translation: Judge: 但我看不到<u>任何</u>矛盾之处。

original: Ruby: Perhaps you should look harder, Your Honor.
translation: Ruby: 也许你需要再仔细查看下，法官阁下。

original: Aria: Or perhaps [i]you[/i] should stop making such careless claims.
translation: Aria: 又或许是<u>你</u>不应该再提出如此草率的论点。

original: Ruby: R-[p/][s/]Right...
translation: Ruby: 好、[p/][s/]好吧……

original: What's wrong with you?[p/] You're usually much less careless.
translation: 你怎么了？[p/]你通常没这么粗心大意。

original: You have the evidence you need.[p/] Just PRESENT it to the court.
translation: 你有所需的证据。[p/]只要向法庭 <size=1.5em>出示</size> 就好。

original: Ruby: Your Honor.[p/] The prosecution's case against my client is riddled with holes.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]检方对我的委托人的指控漏洞百出。

original: Ruby: And the prosecution's proposed "motive" is the largest among them.
translation: Ruby: 尤其是检方提出的“动机”。

original: Judge: What do you mean, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Judge: 泰摩拉女士，这是什么意思？

original: Judge: Of all the elements in this case,[p/] the motive is the most believable.
translation: Judge: 就本案的所有因素来说，[p/]检方提出的动机是最为可信的。

original: Judge: Your client would have had much to gain through her father's inheritance.
translation: Judge: 你的委托人可以从她父亲的遗产中获得不少收益。

original: Ruby: That may be.
translation: Ruby: 可能。

original: Ruby: ...But that's assuming my client had [i]anything[/i] to inherit at all!
translation: Ruby: ……但我的委托人根本继承不了<u>任何</u>遗产！

original: Aria: ...What?
translation: Aria: ……什么？

original: Ruby: Your Honor,[p/] my client fled from her psychologically abusive father five years ago.
translation: Ruby: 法官阁下，[p/]我的委托人在五年前就逃离了对她进行精神虐待的父亲。

original: Ruby: How do you think [i]he[/i] would have reacted to that?
translation: Ruby: 你觉得<u>他</u>会对此作何反应？

original: Ruby: Lord Frega was a petty and vindictive man.
translation: Ruby: 弗雷加勋爵是个小气又记仇的人。

original: Ruby: Do you honestly think that he'd leave his inheritance to someone who disobeyed him so egregiously?
translation: Ruby: 你真认为他会把遗产留给一个像那样严重忤逆他的人吗？

original: Ruby: ...No.[p/][s/] He'd do everything in his power to make sure she didn't see a [i]shred[/i] of his wealth!
translation: Ruby: ……不会。[p/][s/]他会竭尽所能确保她得不到<u>一丝一毫</u>的遗产！

original: Aria: Yes.[p/] We're already well aware of this.
translation: Aria: 是的。[p/]我们已经很清楚这一点了。

original: The moment she slams her cane down,[p/] you notice the prosecutor wince a little.
translation: 她用手杖猛击地面时，[p/]你注意到检察官微微皱了下眉。

original: But she quickly hides it and regains her composure.
translation: 但她很快掩饰过去，恢复了镇定。

original: Aria: ...On the night of the murder,[p/] the victim made the decision to disinherit the defendant.
translation: Aria: ……谋杀当晚，[p/]受害者决定剥夺被告的继承权。

original: Aria: However,[p/] his murder deprived him of the opportunity to submit his will to his attorney.
translation: Aria: 然而，[p/]谋杀使他失去了向律师提交遗嘱的机会。

original: Aria: This only further proves the defendant's motive.
translation: Aria: 这进一步证明了被告的动机。

original: Aria: She would have needed to act quickly.[p/] Lest her father submit the changed will.
translation: Aria: 她需要尽快行动，[p/]以免她的父亲提交修改后的遗嘱。

original: Ruby: I'm afraid [i]you're[/i] mistaken, Steelwind.[p/] William Frega didn't disinherit my client that night.
translation: Ruby: 恐怕<u>你</u>错了，斯蒂尔文德。[p/]威廉·弗雷加并不是在谋杀当晚剥夺了我的委托人的继承权。

original: Ruby: He disinherited my client five years ago!
translation: Ruby: 而是早在五年前就已经剥夺了她的继承权！

original: Ruby: I have witness testimony from Miriam Frega:[p/] William's youngest daughter.
translation: Ruby: 威廉的小女儿，米莉亚姆·弗雷加可以为此作证。

original: Ruby: By her own admission,[p/][s/] her father disinherited my client shortly after she fled the household!
translation: Ruby: 她亲口承认，[p/][s/]在比亚特丽丝离家后不久，她的父亲就剥夺了我委托人的继承权！

original: Aria: ...What?!
translation: Aria: ……什么？！

original: Aria: She...[p/] never brought that up during questioning...
translation: Aria: 她……[p/]在询问期间完全没提到过……

original: Ruby: Perhaps she's not as amicable to you as you thought.
translation: Ruby: 或许她对你并不像你想象的那么友好。

original: Ruby: If you don't believe me,[p/][s/] why don't we call her to the stand and ask her ourselves?!
translation: Ruby: 如果你不相信我，[p/][s/]不如让她站上证人席亲自问问？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Aria: ...What are you planning, Ms. Tymora?
translation: Aria: ……泰摩拉女士，你在谋划什么？

original: Ruby: I have [i]no[/i] idea what you're talking about.
translation: Ruby: 我<u>不知道</u>你在说什么。

original: Aria: ...Well,[p/] it's clear we won't get anywhere until we hear from Miriam directly.
translation: Aria: ……好吧，[p/]很明显我们只能亲耳听听米莉亚姆的证词了。

original: Aria: Bailiff,[p/] please escort Miriam Frega to the stand.
translation: Aria: 法警，[p/]请护送米莉亚姆·弗雷加小姐到证人席。

original: ARIA: ...Miriam.[p/] Is the defense correct?
translation: ARIA: ……米莉亚姆。[p/]辩方说的是真的吗？

original: Aria: Did your father disinherit Beatrice five years ago?
translation: Aria: 你父亲在五年前就剥夺了比亚特丽丝的继承权吗？

original: Miriam: Y-[p/][s/]Yes...
translation: Miriam: 是、[p/][s/]是的……

original: Aria: ...And you didn't think it was [i]necessary[/i] to share this information with me?
translation: Aria: ……你不觉得这是<u>有必要</u>和我分享的信息吗？

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]Well...[p/] You never asked.
translation: Miriam: 呃、[p/][s/]嗯……[p/]你没问过我。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……
