original: You should speak with her and get more details about Lord Frega's actions that night.
translation: 你应该找她聊聊弗雷加勋爵当晚行动的细节。

original: Tyrion: By the way, Steelwind.[p/] Do you have a map of the manor?
translation: Tyrion: 顺带一提，斯蒂尔文德。[p/]你有庄园的地图吗？

original: Aria: I do.[p/] Would you like a copy?
translation: Aria: 我有，[p/]你想要一份吗？

original: Tyrion: Please and thank you.
translation: Tyrion: 拜托给我一份，谢谢。

original: Tyrion: Were there any other witnesses aside from Laefe who saw Lord Frega that night?
translation: Tyrion: 除了拉菲以外，当晚还有其他见到过弗雷加勋爵的目击者吗？

original: Tyrion: Perhaps someone heard what happened from a nearby room.
translation: Tyrion: 可能有人从附近房间听到了什么动静。

original: Aria: There [i]was[/i] someone who heard the altercation.[p/] But it was quite obscured.
translation: Aria: 确实<u>有人</u>听到了争论，[p/]不过并不清楚。

original: Aria: A servant was trapped in a storage room nearby.
translation: Aria: 一个佣人当时被困在了附近的储藏室。

original: Aria: There's an air vent that connects this room with that storage room.
translation: Aria: 有一段通风管道将书房与储藏室相连。

original: Aria: He supposedly heard sounds of a struggle through that vent.
translation: Aria: 据说他从管道内听到挣扎的声音。

original: Tyrion: What did this witness hear?
translation: Tyrion: 证人听见了什么？

original: Aria: There were sounds of a struggle before he heard Lord Frega choking on his own blood.
translation: Aria: 有几声挣扎的声音，之后就是弗雷加勋爵被自己的血呛到的声音。

original: Aria: When the lockdown was lifted,[p/] he informed the Kingsguard of what he heard.
translation: Aria: 封锁结束后，[p/]他立刻向国王卫队告知了他听到的声音。

original: Aria: That's when they discovered the body.
translation: Aria: 也就是在那时发现的尸体。

original: Tyrion: I see.[p/] Who was this servant?
translation: Tyrion: 我明白了。[p/]那个佣人是谁？

original: Aria: I believe you actually know him.[p/] His name is Jan Hughes.
translation: Aria: 你肯定认识他。[p/]他叫简·休斯。

original: Wallace: Wait...[p/] Mr. Hughes is here?
translation: Wallace: 等下……[p/]休斯先生在这？

original: You never expected to see [i]him[/i] again.[p/] Much less [i]here[/i] of all places.
translation: 真没想到能再见<u>他</u>一面。[p/]更别提是在<u>这里</u>了。

original: But if he heard the altercation,[p/] you'll definitely want to speak with him.
translation: 但如果他听到了争吵的声音，[p/]你肯定要和他聊聊。

original: Tyrion: I think I'm lacking a lot of information about the defendant.
translation: Tyrion: 我缺乏被告的信息。

original: Tyrion: From the way you were both acting,[p/] you and Aster seemed to know her.
translation: Tyrion: 从你们两个人的反应来看，[p/]你和阿斯特认识她。

original: Aria: ...Your mentor didn't tell you about her?
translation: Aria: ……你的导师没告诉过你她的事吗？

original: Tyrion: No.[p/] I try not to pry into her business.
translation: Tyrion: 没有。[p/]我尽量不去打探她的事。

original: Aria: ...I see.
translation: Aria: ……这样。

original: Aria: I honestly don't know much about what happened either.
translation: Aria: 我其实也不太清楚实情。

original: Aria: But Beatrice was Lord Frega's eldest daughter and the former heir to House Frega.
translation: Aria: 但比亚特丽丝是弗雷加勋爵的大女儿，弗雷加家的前继承人。

original: Tyrion: "[i]Former[/i] heir"?
translation: Tyrion: “<u>前</u>继承人”？

original: Aria: About five years ago,[p/] she fled Frega Manor and went into hiding.
translation: Aria: 大约五年前，[p/]她离开了弗雷加庄园并躲了起来。

original: Aria: None of us knew where she'd gone.[p/] She ignored any attempts we made to contact her.
translation: Aria: 没人知道她去了哪里。[p/]她无视了所有联络。

original: Aria: She even used her magic to prevent us from [b]Scrying[/b] her.
translation: Aria: 她甚至用魔法来防止我们[b]灵视[/b]追踪她。

original: Aria: Last night's ball was the first time in years that Aster and I had seen her.
translation: Aria: 昨晚的舞会是多年来我和阿斯特第一次看见她。

original: But if that's true,[p/] how did [i]Ms. Tymora[/i] meet her?!
translation: 但如果此话不假，[p/]<u>泰摩拉女士</u>是怎么和她见面的？！

original: Tyrion: ...Would you happen to know why Beatrice was meeting with her father after all these years?
translation: Tyrion: ……你知道为什么这么多年之后，比亚特丽丝要和她父亲见面吗？

original: Aria: I have some ideas,[p/] but nothing concrete.
translation: Aria: 我有一些猜测，[p/]但不确定。

original: Aria: I was hoping [i]you[/i] could tell me.
translation: Aria: 我本想着<u>你</u>能告诉我的。

original: Aria: Tymora and Beatrice have both refused to disclose anything about their meeting.
translation: Aria: 泰摩拉和比亚特丽丝都对她们之间的会面闭口不谈。

original: Damn it...[p/] What could that meeting have been about?
translation: 可恶……[p/]她们会面到底聊了什么？

original: Aria: Speaking of which,[p/] I haven't seen Tymora anywhere in the manor.
translation: Aria: 说到这，[p/]我在庄园内没见到泰摩拉。

original: Aria: As the defendant's attorney,[p/] I would have thought that she'd be here to investigate the murder alongside you.
translation: Aria: 作为被告的辩护律师，[p/]我本想着她本人会和你一起来现场调查。

original: That [i]is[/i] strange...[p/] But Ms. Tymora has always had her own way of doing things.
translation: 这<u>确实</u>很怪……[p/]但泰摩拉女士有她自己的做事方法。

original: Perhaps she's using a different strategy.
translation: 或许她是在采用其他策略。

original: Aria: Anyways,[p/] I imagine that she met with her father to request financial aid.
translation: Aria: 总之，[p/]我觉得她是来找她父亲寻求经济援助的。

original: Tyrion: Why do you say that?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么？

original: Aria: ...I have it on good authority that she was deeply in debt.
translation: Aria: ……据可靠消息称，她负债累累。

original: Aria: That's the only reason why she would speak with her father after all these years.
translation: Aria: 这是她这么多年后愿意和她父亲沟通的唯一理由。

original: Aria: It's also why I believe she murdered her father.
translation: Aria: 而且我也坚信这是她杀害她父亲的动机。

original: Tyrion: ...You think she murdered him for his inheritance?
translation: Tyrion: ……你认为她是为了继承权谋杀了她父亲？

original: Aria: It's the only motive that makes sense.
translation: Aria: 这是唯一合理的动机。

original: Aria: I was quite surprised to see you two at the Lords' Ball, yesterday.
translation: Aria: 真没想到昨天能在勋爵的舞会上看见你们两个。

original: Tyrion: Yeah...[p/] It's a long story.
translation: Tyrion: 啊……[p/]这倒是说来话长。

original: Aria: Clearly.[p/] You came accompanied by Beatrice Frega.
translation: Aria: 显然。[p/]你与比亚特丽丝·弗雷加一同到来。

original: Aria: She was the last person I expected to see that night.
translation: Aria: 她是我当晚最没想到会遇见的人。

original: You sense some disdain in her voice.
translation: 你从她声音中听出一丝轻蔑。

original: Aria: I apologize that your investigation didn't lead anywhere, Ms. McCoy.
translation: Aria: 很抱歉关于你身世的调查没什么进展，麦考伊女士。

original: Celeste: No, it's fine.[p/] My expectations weren't that high coming into this.
translation: Celeste: 没事的，不必道歉。[p/]我本来也不抱什么希望。

original: Celeste: But I still wanted to try, you know?
translation: Celeste: 但我还是想尝试一下。

original: Aria: If only I could have that much optimism.
translation: Aria: 要是我能有你这样乐观的心态就好了。

original: Celeste: Steelwind.[p/] Did the Inquisition happen to find my sword anywhere?
translation: Celeste: 斯蒂尔文德。[p/]裁判所找到我的剑了吗？

original: Aria: [i]Your[/i] sword?
translation: Aria: <u>你的</u>剑？

original: Aria: I can't say I've heard anything about it.[p/] And I'm sure the Inquisition would have recognized it.
translation: Aria: 我没收到相关报告。[p/]如果找到了的话，裁判所肯定会认出来的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] I'm sure we'll find it somewhere.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]我们肯定能找到的。

original: Celeste: Yeah...
translation: Celeste: 嗯……

original: Tyrion: We somehow always end up meeting each other, don't we?
translation: Tyrion: 我们总能莫名其妙地相遇，不是吗？

original: Aria: Well, it can't be helped.[p/] We work on opposite sides of the same profession, after all.
translation: Aria: 嗯，这也是没办法的事，[p/]毕竟我们的工作性质如此。

original: Aria: Although,[p/] I am remiss that I still don't know much about you,[p/] despite our many meetings.
translation: Aria: 不过惭愧的是，[p/]虽然我们见过这么多面，[p/]但我还是对你一无所知。

original: Aria: Would you like to go somewhere together in the future?
translation: Aria: 有兴趣将来一起去什么别的地方吗？

original: Tyrion: O-[p/][s/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 啊、[p/][s/]这……

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: I'm only joking.[p/] I would never think of asking you out in front of your lover.
translation: Aria: 开个玩笑而已。[p/]我可从没想过在你女朋友面前约你出去。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wha-?!
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！

original: Tyrion: C-[p/][s/]Celeste is-
translation: Tyrion: 塞、[p/][s/]塞莱斯特是——

original: You find yourself stammering over your words.
translation: 你发现自己说话结结巴巴的。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Celeste: Wait a minute...[p/][s/] Is this payback for last night?!
translation: Celeste: 等下……[p/][s/]这是对昨晚的报复吗？！

original: Aria: You're mistaken, Ms. McCoy.[p/] I have no idea what you're speaking of.
translation: Aria: 你一定是搞错了，麦考伊女士。[p/]我完全不知道你在说什么。

original: Tyrion: I haven't seen Commander White since last night.
translation: Tyrion: 从昨晚开始就没见到怀特指挥官。

original: Aria: He's currently collecting statements from the witnesses that night.
translation: Aria: 他正收集当晚证人们的证言。

original: Aria: I hope he's competent enough to do [i]that[/i] correctly.
translation: Aria: 我希望他能做好<u>那份</u>差事。

original: Right...[p/] He hasn't had the best streak as of late.
translation: 这倒是……[p/]他最近状态不太好。

original: Tyrion: Is this the first time you've faced off against Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 这是你第一次与泰摩拉女士对峙吗？

original: Aria: No...[p/] I've prosecuted her defendants before.
translation: Aria: 不是……[p/]我之前起诉过的被告里也有她负责辩护的人。

original: Aria: I've actually had a better track record of convicting her defendants over yours.
translation: Aria: 其实我对上她的胜诉记录要比对上你的好看不少。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]Wait,[p/][s/] really?!
translation: Tyrion: 等、[p/][s/]等下，[p/][s/]真的假的？！

original: Aria: I wouldn't let that inflate your ego, though.[p/] You're clearly more picky about who you defend.
translation: Aria: 我不会助长你自大的气焰，[p/]不过你确实在辩护对象的选择上很挑剔。

original: Tyrion: What's [i]that[/i] supposed to mean?
translation: Tyrion: <u>那</u>又是什么意思？

original: Aria: You tend to pick defendants that you're sure are innocent.
translation: Aria: 你似乎只为你确定无罪的人辩护。

original: Tyrion: I'm sure Ms. Tymora does that too.
translation: Tyrion: 我很确定泰摩拉女士也是这样做的。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: I wonder how Miriam is taking all of this...
translation: Tyrion: 真不敢想米莉亚姆要怎么承受这一切……

original: Aria: I'm surprised that you're worried about her.
translation: Aria: 真没想到你还会担心她。

original: Aria: Last I remember,[p/] she was quite furious with you two for tricking her.
translation: Aria: 据我所知，[p/]你们两个耍的小把戏把她气得够呛。

original: Tyrion: She may be a pompous jerk,[p/] but she still lost her father.
translation: Tyrion: 她可能傲慢自负，[p/]但她也失去了亲生父亲。

original: Tyrion: And now her long-lost sister is being charged with murder.
translation: Tyrion: 她失散多年的姐姐还被指控谋杀。

original: Celeste: Yeah...[p/] She must be going through a lot.
translation: Celeste: 对啊……[p/]她心里一定很不好受。

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Not that I doubt his skills, but...
translation: Tyrion: 不是我质疑他的能力，但……

original: Tyrion: Why choose Wallace as an aide?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么选华莱士作为你的助手？

original: Wallace: U-[p/][s/]Um...[p/] W-[p/][s/]Well-
translation: Wallace: 啊、[p/][s/]唔……[p/]这、[p/][s/]这个——

original: Aria: I have my own reasons for choosing him.
translation: Aria: 选择他作为助手自有我的理由。

original: Aria: And he [i]does[/i] owe me.
translation: Aria: 而且他<u>确实</u>欠我一个人情。

original: Wallace: Yeah...[p/] If it weren't for Ms. Steelwind,[p/] I wouldn't be able to continue studying [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: Wallace: 没错……[p/]如果不是斯蒂尔文德女士帮忙，我肯定没法继续学习[b]死灵术[/b]了。

original: Tyrion: You've been able to continue studying it?
translation: Tyrion: 你可以继续学习吗？

original: Wallace: Yeah.[p/] Ms. Steelwind introduced me to Lord Asclepius.
translation: Wallace: 嗯。[p/]斯蒂尔文德把我推荐给了阿斯克勒庇俄斯勋爵。

original: Wallace: He belongs to one of the few noble houses that are still allowed to study [b]necromancy[/b].
translation: Wallace: 他是目前少数仍被允许学习[b]死灵术[/b]的家族一员。

original: Aria: Unfortunately,[p/] because of that,[p/] they hold very little political power.
translation: Aria: 可惜的是，[p/]因为能够研究禁术，[p/]他们的政治影响力微弱。

original: Wallace: I'm just glad I'm still able to continue my studies.
translation: Wallace: 能继续学习死灵术我就很开心了。

original: Tyrion: I'm sure you have mixed feelings about Aster hiring us.
translation: Tyrion: 你对阿斯特雇佣我们这件事一定五味杂陈。

original: Aria: I don't.[p/] He is free to put his trust in whoever he wishes.
translation: Aria: 这倒没有。[p/]他要相信谁是他的自由。

original: The Eye of Horus begs to differ.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼倒不这么觉得。

original: Aria: He [i]clearly[/i] trusts your judgment more than mine.
translation: Aria: 比起我，他<u>显然</u>更相信你的决断。

original: Aria: He didn't even [i]think[/i] to ask me.
translation: Aria: 他甚至都没<u>想过</u>来问问我。

original: Celeste: Tyrion.[p/] Change the subject, please.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂。[p/]快换个话题。

original: Tyrion: I think I'm lacking a lot of information about Beatrice Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 我不太了解比亚特丽丝·弗雷加这个人。

original: Tyrion: From the way you were both acting,[p/] you and Aster seemed to know her.
translation: Tyrion: 从你们两个人的反应来看，[p/]你和阿斯特认识她。

original: Aria: ...Your mentor didn't tell you about her?
translation: Aria: ……你的导师没告诉过你她的事吗？

original: Tyrion: No.[p/] I try not to pry into her business.
translation: Tyrion: 没有。[p/]我尽量不去打探她的事。

original: Aria: ...I see.
translation: Aria: ……我明白了。

original: Aria: I honestly don't know much about what happened either.
translation: Aria: 我其实也不太清楚实情。

original: Aria: But Beatrice was Lord Frega's eldest daughter and the former heir to House Frega.
translation: Aria: 但比亚特丽丝是弗雷加勋爵的大女儿，弗雷加家的前继承人。

original: Tyrion: "[i]Former[/i] heir"?
translation: Tyrion: “<u>前</u>继承人”？

original: Aria: About five years ago,[p/] she fled Frega Manor and went into hiding.
translation: Aria: 大约五年前，[p/]她离开了弗雷加庄园并躲了起来。

original: Aria: None of us knew where she'd gone or even if she was still alive.
translation: Aria: 没人知道她去了哪里，甚至没人知道她是死是活。

original: Aria: Last night's ball was the first time in years that Aster and I had even seen her.
translation: Aria: 昨晚的舞会是多年来我和阿斯特第一次看见她。

original: But if that's true,[p/] how did [i]Ms. Tymora[/i] meet her?!
translation: 但如果此话不假，[p/]<u>泰摩拉女士</u>是怎么和她见面的？！

original: Tyrion: If it's not too much trouble,[p/] do you know how Beatrice became blind?
translation: Tyrion: 如果可以的话，[p/]能告诉我比亚特丽丝是怎么失明的吗？

original: Aria: I'm sorry.[p/] But I'm not going to discuss that. [mind="It would just dig up old wounds..."/]
translation: Aria: 抱歉。[p/]但这不是我该说的。[mind="这事只会揭开旧伤……"/]

original: Tyrion: Right...[p/] Of course.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧……[p/]不必道歉。

original: So she [i]does[/i] know what happened.
translation: 所以说她<u>确实</u>知道发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: Why would Harold keep such a dangerous weapon on display?
translation: Tyrion: 为什么哈罗德会展览这么危险的武器？

original: Aria: There's value in remembering and honoring our kingdom's history.[p/] Especially the unsavory parts.
translation: Aria: 王国历史需要被铭记，[p/]不那么光彩的部分也一样。

original: Aria: Anyways,[p/] the exhibits were heavily protected.
translation: Aria: 总之，[p/]展品受到严密保护。

original: Aria: Only a powerful mage like Beatrice could have broken into them.
translation: Aria: 只有像比亚特丽丝那样强大的法师才能破坏展柜。

original: So even Steelwind considers Beatrice to be a powerful mage.
translation: 甚至斯蒂尔文德都认可比亚特丽丝是位强大的法师。

original: Tyrion: I still fail to understand how you think Beatrice broke into Haroldson's secure exhibits.
translation: Tyrion: 我还是不理解，为什么你觉得比亚特丽丝能打破哈罗德森的展柜。

original: Aria: Despite being blind,[p/] she was an extremely powerful and learned mage.
translation: Aria: 虽然她失明了，[p/]她仍是位极其强大且学识渊博的法师。

original: Aria: Her abilities even surpassed her father's.
translation: Aria: 她甚至要强于她的父亲。

original: Aria: It's really a shame that [i]this[/i] is how it all turned out.
translation: Aria: 事情变成<u>这个</u>样子实在是令人惋惜。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about William Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 能聊聊威廉·弗雷加吗？

original: Aria: He was a chauvinistic pig.
translation: Aria: 他是只崇尚沙文主义的猪。

original: Wow...[p/] That's pretty blunt.
translation: 哇哦……[p/]这可真是直白。

original: Aria: My family has been at odds with the Fregas for as long as we can remember.
translation: Aria: 从我记事起，我的家族就与弗雷加家不和。

original: Aria: My father is probably salivating at the thought of House Frega losing its head.
translation: Aria: 没准我父亲想到弗雷加家首领死了得乐开花。

original: Tyrion: What's your impression of Laefe Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 你对拉菲·弗雷加有什么印象？

original: Aria: She tends to keep to herself.[p/] So I don't know her very well.
translation: Aria: 她比较内向。[p/]我和她不是很熟。

original: Aria: After Beatrice left,[p/] Lord Frega publicly named her as his heir.
translation: Aria: 比亚特丽丝离开后，[p/]弗雷加勋爵公开将她定为继承人。

original: Aria: That must have been a difficult burden for her to bear.
translation: Aria: 对她来说一定是个艰苦重担。

original: Tyrion: The crime scene was a locked room with no method of entry.
translation: Tyrion: 没有入室方法的犯罪现场成了一间密室。

original: Aria: But Lord Frega still died.[p/] That means that the murderer used something to nullify the lockdown in some way.
translation: Aria: 但弗雷加勋爵还是死了。[p/]这意味着凶手使用了某种手段将封锁无效化。

original: But did they really use the Sword of Spell-Eating to do so?
translation: 但凶手真的是用噬法之剑做到的吗？

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 关于这个你有什么看法吗？斯蒂尔文德。

original: Aria: I'm sorry.[p/] But I'm not the person to ask about that.
translation: Aria: 抱歉。[p/]但我恐怕没什么能说的。

original: You arrive at the crime scene and see the usual swarm of Inquisition knights.
translation: 你到达犯罪现场，看到裁判所的骑士们正在进行调查。

original: However,[p/] you also spot some members of the Kingsguard.
translation: 然而不同以往，[p/]你还看到了一些国王卫队的成员。

original: They must be working together since the victim is from one of the Pillar Families.
translation: 由于此案受害者属于四大支柱家族，他们一定是在合作调查此案。

original: Aria: I wasn't expecting to see you here, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: 我可没想到会在这里见到你，卡斯伯特先生。

original: Aria: I thought Ruby Tymora was defending this case.
translation: Aria: 我以为本案的辩护律师是鲁比·泰摩拉呢。

original: Prosecutor Steelwind approaches you as you enter the study.
translation: 一走进书房，斯蒂尔文德检察官就走上前来向你搭话。

original: And she's followed by an unexpected yet familiar face.
translation: 她身边跟着一个意想不到的熟面孔。

original: Celeste: Wallace?[p/] What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Celeste: 华莱士？[p/]<u>你</u>在这儿干嘛？

original: Wallace: I-
translation: Wallace: 我——

original: Aria: He's here as my aide for the investigation.
translation: Aria: 他是我本次调查的助手。

original: You don't doubt Wallace's abilities.[p/] But you can't think of any reason why Steelwind would need his help.
translation: 你并非质疑华莱士的能力。[p/]但你实在想不出斯蒂尔文德需要他帮助的理由。

original: But you suppose it's none of your business.
translation: 不过这倒是与你无关。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] we're here on behalf of Crown Prince Aster.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们是代表阿斯特王储殿下来这里的。

original: Tyrion: He hired us to investigate this case independently.
translation: Tyrion: 他雇佣我们独立调查此案。

original: Aria: I...[p/] see.
translation: Aria: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: Celeste: I-[p/][s/]I'm sure he just wants to make sure the investigation goes smoothly.
translation: Celeste: 我、[p/][s/]我觉得他只是想要让调查更顺利的进行。

original: Aria: ...Well,[p/] if you're here on behalf of His Highness,[p/] I'll do whatever I can to help you.
translation: Aria: ……好吧，[p/]既然你们是代表殿下来进行调查，[p/]我会尽我所能帮忙。

original: This whole situation is quite unorthodox.[p/] But your goal remains the same.
translation: 虽然一反常规，[p/]但你要做的事还是一样。

original: Perhaps Steelwind can tell you more about what happened.
translation: 或许斯蒂尔文德能告诉你到底发生了什么。

original: Alright,[p/] there's a lot to work through here.
translation: 好吧，[p/]你要忙的事可不少。

original: The prosecution will try to assert that Beatrice committed the murder.
translation: 检方会断言比亚特丽丝实施了犯罪。

original: But what would she have needed to do to carry out all of the actions described?
translation: 但问题是失明的她怎么执行这些行动呢？

original: Tyrion: So the first thing we need to do is narrow down the time in which the murder occurred.
translation: Tyrion: 首先我们需要缩小谋杀发生的时间范围。

original: Celeste: The body was discovered [i]after[/i] the lockdown was lifted.
translation: Celeste: 尸体在封锁结束<u>之后</u>被发现。

original: Tyrion: And Laefe Frega saw her father alive before it was activated.
translation: Tyrion: 而且在封锁激活前，拉菲·弗雷加亲眼看到她父亲还活着。

original: Tyrion: He entered his study and she watched as the lock engaged.
translation: Tyrion: 她亲眼看见他走进书房锁上门。

original: No...[p/] If we assume that Laefe's testimony is correct,[p/] William Frega [i]was[/i] alive before the lockdown was triggered.
translation: 不对……[p/]假设拉菲的证言是正确的，[p/]威廉·弗雷加在封锁激活之前还活着。

original: Not only that,[p/] he said that he would stay in the Study for the rest of the night.
translation: 不仅如此，[p/]他说过他要在书房里过夜。

original: Which means that he probably never left his study.
translation: 也就是说他大概率从未离开过书房。

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] The murder must have occurred during the lockdown.
translation: Tyrion: 没错。[p/]谋杀发生在封锁过程中。

original: Celeste: But that means that the murderer somehow got past the abjuration wards that protected this room.
translation: Celeste: 但也就是说凶手以某种方法绕过了防护术结界。

original: Tyrion: Those wards block teleportation.[p/] And they magically locked the only door leading into this room.
translation: Tyrion: 这些结界能屏蔽传送，[p/]唯一能进出房间的门也有附魔锁。

original: Tyrion: Steelwind and the Inquisition believe that Beatrice used the Sword of Spell Eating to get past them.
translation: Tyrion: 斯蒂尔文德和裁判所坚信，比亚特丽丝用噬法之剑规避了这些防护措施。

original: Tyrion: Regardless of what they think,[p/] we need to assume that the murderer used some kind of magic nullification to get into William's study.
translation: Tyrion: 先不管他们怎么想，[p/]凶手一定使用了某种手段让魔法无效化，才能进入威廉的书房。

original: Celeste: But that's not necessarily true, is it?
translation: Celeste: 但也不一定是这样吧？

original: Celeste: What if the murderer entered the room [i]before[/i] William locked it?
translation: Celeste: 要是在威廉锁门<u>之前</u>，凶手就进入了房间呢？

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] If they were in the room when William locked it,[p/] they would have been trapped here until he decided to leave.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]如果威廉锁门时凶手就在房间里，那在他决定离开之前都会被困在这儿。

original: Tyrion: Not only that.[p/] They would have been discovered the moment the guards entered his study.
translation: Tyrion: 不只如此，[p/]守卫进入书房时，凶手会被立刻发现。

original: Celeste: Maybe they used some kind of invisibility?
translation: Celeste: 或许他用了某种隐身术？

original: Celeste: Or they could have teleported away the moment the Kingsguard unlocked the door.
translation: Celeste: 也可能是在国王卫队开锁的一瞬间传送走了。

original: Aria: Teleportation didn't occur.[p/] We didn't find any traces of [b]conjuration[/b] magic.
translation: Aria: 没有发生任何传送。[p/]我们没有在房间内找到任何[b]召唤术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: What about Celeste's theory of an invisible assailant?
translation: Tyrion: 那塞莱斯特提到的隐形凶手理论可行吗？

original: Aria: I'll admit that we [i]did[/i] find traces of [b]illusion[/b] magic.
translation: Aria: 我们的确找到了[b]幻象术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Aria: But the moment the guards saw the body,[p/] one of them cast [b]Detect Magic[/b].
translation: Aria: 但在卫兵发现尸体的瞬间，[p/]其中一人就施展了[b]法术探测[/b]。

original: Aria: With that spell,[p/] they would have seen any invisible people hiding in this room.
translation: Aria: 利用这个法术，[p/]他们也可以发现任何隐身藏在房间里的人。

original: Celeste: Wait, you can use [b]Detect Magic[/b] like that?
translation: Celeste: 等等，[b]法术探测[/b]还能这么用啊？

original: Aria: Of course.[p/] It's standard procedure.
translation: Aria: 当然了。[p/]这是标准程序。

original: Aria: Like all spells,[p/] [b]Invisibility[/b] leaves traces of magic on the person it's cast on.
translation: Aria: 与其他法术一样，[p/][b]隐形术[/b]也会在被施法者身上留下魔法痕迹。

original: Aria: So mages can use [b]Detect Magic[/b] as a way to see through invisibility.
translation: Aria: 所以法师们可以利用[b]法术探测[/b]来破解[b]隐形术[/b]。

original: Tyrion: So we know for sure that they weren't here before or after the lockdown.
translation: Tyrion: 所以封锁之前和之后，凶手都不在这儿。

original: Tyrion: This means that whoever committed the murder used some way to bypass the abjurative wards that protect this room.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说凶手以某种方法规避了房间的防护结界。

original: Tyrion: The next thing to consider is the murder weapon.
translation: Tyrion: 接下来是凶器。

original: Tyrion: It was a letter opener that was presumably owned by William Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 凶器是一把多半属于威廉·弗雷加的拆信刀。

original: Tyrion: The murderer probably used it to avoid leaving evidence that incriminated them.
translation: Tyrion: 凶手选择这把刀的理由，可能是为了避免留下与自己相关的证据。

original: No...[p/] The letter opener was clearly owned by William Frega.
translation: 不对……[p/]这把拆信刀明显是威廉·弗雷加的。

original: So where would the murderer have taken it from?
translation: 所以凶手会从哪里拿到这把刀呢？

original: Tyrion: Right.[p/] The letter opener came from this room.
translation: Tyrion: 没错。[p/]这把拆信刀就来自房间内。

original: Tyrion: The murderer probably wanted to avoid using a weapon that would've implicated them.
translation: Tyrion: 凶手或许是想避免留下与自己相关的证据。

original: Tyrion: So they decided to use it and leave it here after the deed was done.
translation: Tyrion: 所以凶手决定使用这把刀，并在行凶后将之丢在现场。

original: Tyrion: ...But that leaves a glaring hole in the prosecution's case.
translation: Tyrion: ……但这给检方的指控留下了一个明显的漏洞。

original: Aria: And what would that be, Mr. Cuthbert?
translation: Aria: 卡斯伯特先生，是什么漏洞呢？

original: No...[p/] The prosecution's allegations are definitely possible.
translation: 不对……[p/]检方的指控有一定可行性。

original: However,[p/] the flaw with Steelwind's case lies in [i]who[/i] she's targetting it with.
translation: 然而，[p/]斯蒂尔文德的疏漏在于选了<u>谁</u>作为目标。

original: Tyrion: Beatrice Frega is completely blind.
translation: Tyrion: 比亚特丽丝·弗雷加完全失明。

original: Tyrion: Even [i]if[/i] she were somehow able to break into a highly guarded exhibit,[p/] how did she slip past the guards and enter Lord Frega's study?
translation: Tyrion: 即使她能闯进一个高度设防的展区，[p/]她又如何潜入弗雷加勋爵的书房呢？

original: Aria: ...
translation: Aria: ……

original: Tyrion: Furthermore,[p/] how did she locate the letter opener if she couldn't see it in the first place?
translation: Tyrion: 而且，[p/]在她什么都看不见的情况下，又怎么能找到那把拆信刀呢？

original: Tyrion: None of it makes sense.
translation: Tyrion: 没有一处说得通。

original: Tyrion: Committing this murder unseen would've been a tall order for anyone.[p/] I can hardly believe a blind person did all of this.
translation: Tyrion: 避人耳目地实施谋杀已经非常困难了。[p/]很难想象盲人可以做到这些。

original: Aria: ...You'd do well not to underestimate her, Mr. Cuthbert.
translation: Aria: ……卡斯伯特先生，你最好不要低估她。

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Aria: You don't know her as I do.[p/] She's far more capable than you realize... [mind="She must be the one behind this..."/]
translation: Aria: 你不了解她。[p/]她比你想的要能干得多……[mind="她一定是这一切的幕后黑手……"/]

original: Tyrion: I suppose I wouldn't know.[p/] But the idea that Beatrice did any of this is still ludicrous.
translation: Tyrion: 我想我确实不了解她，[p/]但比亚特丽丝是真凶的理论仍然十分荒谬。

original: Aria: I suppose I can't change your mind about that...
translation: Aria: 看来我没办法改变你对此的看法……

original: Aria: But I have to ask you a question, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/]
translation: Aria: 但卡斯伯特先生，我必须问你一个问题。[p/]

original: Aria: What would you do if you discovered that one of your clients was guilty?
translation: Aria: 如果你发现你的委托人有罪，你会怎么做？

original: Tyrion: ...What?
translation: Tyrion: ……什么？

original: Tyrion: I mean...[p/] I tend to have an insight into these sorts of things.
translation: Tyrion: 我……[p/]在这方面有种独特的洞察力。

original: Tyrion: That would never happen.
translation: Tyrion: 这种事是不会发生的。

original: Aria: I've already seen your uncanny ability to read people.[p/] But I'm only hypothetically speaking.
translation: Aria: 我已经见识过你那超凡的识人能力了。[p/]但我现在只是假设。

original: Aria: So...[p/] What would you do if they were guilty?
translation: Aria: 所以说……[p/]如果对方有罪的话你怎么办？

original: Tyrion: I suppose...[p/] I'd withdraw and tell them to find another lawyer.
translation: Tyrion: 我想……[p/]我会放弃辩护，告诉他们去找另一个律师。

original: Aria: And if no one else would represent them?
translation: Aria: 如果没有其他人愿意为他们辩护呢？

original: Tyrion: ...I don't know.[p/] It would definitely be a hard choice for me.
translation: Tyrion: ……我不知道。[p/]对我来说肯定会是个艰难的选择。

original: Tyrion: But...[p/] I would never be able to represent them if I knew the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 但是……[p/]如果知道真相的话，我就没办法再为他们辩护了。

original: Tyrion: I just...[p/] can't stand by and let a murderer escape justice.
translation: Tyrion: 我只是……[p/]不能忍受任何凶手逃脱正义的制裁。

original: Aria: I...[p/] see.
translation: Aria: 我……[p/]明白了。

original: Tyrion: ...Why do you ask?
translation: Tyrion: ……怎么突然问这个？

original: Aria: Hm...[p/] No reason.
translation: Aria: 嗯……[p/]只是一时兴起。

original: Tyrion: ...Okay?
translation: Tyrion: ……好吧？

original: ...Anyways,[p/] she's made her stance clear.
translation: ……总之，[p/]她表明了自己的立场。

original: You still have a lot of leads to follow up on.
translation: 你仍有很多线索需要跟进。

original: You should MOVE somewhere else.
translation: 你应该 <size=1.5em>移动</size> 到别处看看。

original: Tyrion: Big surprise...[p/] Another chandelier.
translation: Tyrion: 大惊喜……[p/]又是一盏吊灯。

original: Celeste: This room probably costs more than my family's tavern.
translation: Celeste: 这房间的内设估计比我家酒馆都贵。

original: Tyrion: It's a fireplace...[p/] William must use this to keep warm during the winter.
translation: Tyrion: 一个壁炉……[p/]威廉在冬天用它来给书房供暖。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some sort of scholar.[p/] There's some text on it.
translation: Tyrion: 一幅学者的画像。有几行字。

original: Tyrion: "Rook Resinger:[p/] economic scholar and aristocratic accountant."
translation: Tyrion: “Rook Resingar：[p/]经济学者以及贵族会计。”

original: Tyrion: "He was known in some circles as "Rook the cook",[p/] due to his ability to "cook" the financial records of the Four Pillar Houses."
translation: Tyrion: “他在某些圈子里被称作厨子 Rook，因为他有“料理”四大家族账单的能力。”

original: Celeste: "Rook the cook"...
translation: Celeste: “厨子 Rook”……

original: Celeste: Sometimes I wish I could have a nickname like that.
translation: Celeste: 我有时候也想获得这种称号。

original: Tyrion: What about "Crimson Demon"?
translation: Tyrion: “绯红恶魔”怎么样？

original: Celeste: Ugh...[p/] Not that one.
translation: Celeste: 呃啊……[p/]别提那个了。

original: Tyrion: It's a bookshelf filled with books.
translation: Tyrion: 摆满书的书架。

original: Celeste: I wonder what kind of books Lord Frega owned.
translation: Celeste: 我蛮好奇弗雷加勋爵会放什么样的书。

original: Celeste: Wait a minute...[p/][s/] They're all blank!
translation: Celeste: 等下……[p/][s/]这些书都是空白的！

original: Tyrion: All of his real books are on the floor or his desk.
translation: Tyrion: 所有真书都在地板或者他桌子上。

original: Tyrion: There's a window that leads into this room...
translation: Tyrion: 有扇通向这房间的窗户……

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] it's magically reinforced.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，[p/]它被魔法强化过。

original: Tyrion: There are several books about economics and politics.
translation: Tyrion: 有几本关于经济和政治的书。

original: Tyrion: It doesn't look like there's anything of note.
translation: Tyrion: 看起来没什么值得注意的。

original: Tyrion: There's a pool of blood and a chalk outline where the body must have been.
translation: Tyrion: 这里有一滩血泊，还有粉笔画出的尸体轮廓。

original: Tyrion: There's a large mahogany table at the end of the room.
translation: Tyrion: 房间尽头摆放着一张大型桃花心木桌子。

original: Tyrion: Lord Frega must have done his work here.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加勋爵就是在这处理公事的。

original: Celeste: There's a trace of [b]illusion[/b] magic where the body was.
translation: Celeste: 尸体的位置上有[b]幻象术[/b]魔法的痕迹。

original: Tyrion: Hm...[p/] The assailant must have used some kind of magical disguise.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]凶手一定用了某种魔法伪装。

original: Celeste: Or they turned themselves invisible.
translation: Celeste: 或者隐身了。

original: Tyrion: You appear to be looking for something, Miriam.
translation: Tyrion: 你看起来在寻找什么东西，米莉亚姆。

original: Tyrion: What could be so important that you'd disturb an [i]active[/i] crime scene?
translation: Tyrion: 什么东西重要到你不惜破坏<u>犯罪现场</u>？

original: Miriam: I-[p/][s/]It's none of your concern.[p/] I'm merely trying to find something that belongs to me.
translation: Miriam: 这、[p/][s/]这与你没有关系。[p/]我只是想找到属于自己的东西。

original: Tyrion: Really?[p/] Because I have a feeling that we might be looking for the same thing.
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗？[p/]我感觉我们可能在找同一个东西。

original: Tyrion: You're looking for the will that your father was drafting, aren't you?
translation: Tyrion: 你在找你父亲最后起草的那份遗嘱，不是吗？

original: Miriam: T-[p/][s/]that's-!
translation: Miriam: 那、[p/][s/]那是——！

original: Celeste: Were you trying to destroy it before we could get to it?
translation: Celeste: 你是想在我们找到之前摧毁它吗？

original: Miriam: N-[p/][s/]No![p/][s/] Of course, not!
translation: Miriam: 没、[p/][s/]没有呀！[p/][s/]当然没有！

original: Miriam: I...
translation: Miriam: 我……

original: Miriam: ...I just needed to see it for myself. [mind="Did she really do this?"/]
translation: Miriam: ……我只是想亲眼看看。[mind="真的是她干的？"/]

original: Oh?[p/] Is she also suspicious of Beatrice?
translation: 哦？[p/]她也在怀疑比亚特丽丝？

original: Tyrion: Why are you so determined to see the drafted will, Ms. Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士，你为什么那么想要看那份遗嘱？

original: Miriam: I just wanted to see what my father's final wishes were.
translation: Miriam: 我只是想看到我父亲的遗愿。

original: Celeste: But your father already had a will filed previously.[p/] Wouldn't [i]that[/i] be enough?
translation: Celeste: 但你父亲之前已经立过一份遗嘱了。[p/]<u>那个</u>还不够吗？

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Tyrion: ...You also suspect something, don't you?
translation: Tyrion: ……你也有所怀疑，不是吗？

original: Miriam: Of course, not![p/][s/] Beatrice would never do something like this!
translation: Miriam: 当然没有！[p/][s/]比亚特丽丝才不可能做这种事情！

original: Tyrion: Ms. Frega,[p/] I never even mentioned Beatrice.
translation: Tyrion: 弗雷加女士。[p/]我可从来没提起比亚特丽丝的名字。

original: Miriam: ...!
translation: Miriam: ……！

original: Tyrion: I know how things may look.[p/] But please understand.[p/] I'm just trying to get to the truth.
translation: Tyrion: 我知道看起来可能不太好。[p/]但请你理解。[p/]我只是想找出真相。

original: Tyrion: I don't think your sister did this,[p/] but she may have been involved.
translation: Tyrion: 我不认为是你姐姐干的，[p/]但她可能参与其中。

original: Tyrion: She may have worked with someone else to orchestrate her father's death.
translation: Tyrion: 她可能与其他人合谋杀死了自己的父亲。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Unlike Laefe,[p/] she didn't immediately deny it.[p/] This means that she already had her own suspicions.
translation: 与拉菲不同，[p/]她没有立马否认。[p/]也意味着她自己已经有所怀疑。

original: Tyrion: Where is the will, Miriam?[p/] I need to see it.
translation: Tyrion: 米莉亚姆，遗嘱在哪里？[p/]我需要知道它的内容。

original: Miriam: I...[p/] don't know.[p/] I haven't been able to find it.
translation: Miriam: 我……[p/]不知道。[p/]我没能找到它。

original: You recall that she was frantically searching William's desk earlier.[p/] She's probably telling the truth.
translation: 你记得早些时候她在疯狂地搜寻威廉的书桌。[p/]她可能在说实话。

original: Miriam: ...It [i]should[/i] have been here.[p/] But I can't find it.
translation: Miriam: ……它<u>应该</u>在这里的。[p/]但我找不到。

original: Tyrion: He locked the door when he began drafting it.[p/] In addition to that,[p/] the Inquisition closed the area off after the body was discovered.
translation: Tyrion: 他在起草遗嘱的时候锁着门。[p/]不只如此，[p/]裁判所在尸体被发现后封锁了整个区域。

original: Tyrion: That means that someone took it [i]during[/i] the lockdown.
translation: Tyrion: 也就是说有人在封锁<u>期间</u>拿走了它。

original: Celeste: It was probably stolen by whoever murdered him, right?
translation: Celeste: 很可能就是凶手偷走了，对吧？

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] That would make the most sense.
translation: Tyrion: 对。[p/]这应该是最合理的。

original: Tyrion: ...Which means that whoever did this [i]wanted[/i] to nullify whatever was written on it.
translation: Tyrion: ……也就意味着不管是谁干的，他都<u>想要</u>抹除上面的内容。

original: It's looking more and more like the motive behind this was William's inheritance.
translation: 背后的动机越来越可能是威廉的遗产。

original: Tyrion: Miriam,[p/] it almost sounds like [i]you[/i] suspect Beatrice as well.
translation: Tyrion: 米莉亚姆，[p/]这听起来几乎就像<u>你</u>也在怀疑比亚特丽丝。

original: Miriam: That's-!
translation: Miriam: 那是——！

original: Tyrion: ...Am I incorrect?
translation: Tyrion: ……我说对了吗？

original: Miriam: I...[p/] don't know what to think anymore. [mind="Why else would she threaten me?"/]
translation: Miriam: 我……[p/]不知道该想什么了。[mind="否则她为什么要威胁我？"/]

original: Wait...[p/][s/] She was threatened?!
translation: 等等……[p/][s/]她被威胁了？！

original: Tyrion: Miriam...[p/] Did Beatrice threaten you in some way?
translation: Tyrion: 米莉亚姆……[p/]比亚特丽丝威胁你了吗？

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]What?![p/][s/] Of course, not!
translation: Miriam: 什、[p/][s/]什么？！[p/][s/]当然没有了！

original: Tyrion: ...Your testimony yesterday was quite convenient for the defense.[p/] It almost got the whole case thrown out.
translation: Tyrion: ……你昨天的证词对辩方来说还挺有利的。[p/]差点把整个案件都推翻了。

original: Tyrion: And Laefe didn't seem to understand what was going on either.
translation: Tyrion: 而且拉菲看起来也不明白到底发生了什么。

original: Tyrion: With the way she gave her testimony yesterday,[p/] it was almost like she was covering for you.
translation: Tyrion: 她昨天作证的那个样子，[p/]看起来就像是要掩护你。

original: Miriam: I... [mind="Does he seriously not know?"/]
translation: Miriam: 我……[mind="他真的不知道吗？"/]

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Miriam: ...Please.[p/] Promise me that you won't tell anyone about this.
translation: Miriam: ……拜托。[p/]答应我你不会告诉其他人。

original: Tyrion: I won't tell anyone.[p/] What happened?
translation: Tyrion: 我不会告诉别人。[p/]发生了什么事？

original: Miriam: About an hour after the murder,[p/] I was approached by Ruby Tymora.
translation: Miriam: 谋杀案发生大约一小时后，[p/]鲁比·泰摩拉来找我。

original: Miriam: She gave me a list of statements to give in my testimony.
translation: Miriam: 她给了我一个证词清单。

original: Miriam: ...The statements weren't true,[p/] but she assured me that my status would protect me from any scrutiny.
translation: Miriam: ……那些句子不是真话，[p/]但她向我保证，我的地位可以确保我不受任何审查。

original: Tyrion: What?!
translation: Tyrion: 什么？！

original: Miriam: She had...[p/] information that I had tried to keep secret.[p/] And she threatened to make it public unless I cooperated with her.
translation: Miriam: 她知道……[p/]一些我一直试图隐藏的秘密。[p/]她威胁说如果我不配合，她就把秘密公开。

original: Miriam: Of all the places,[p/] I never expected to see you here.
translation: Miriam: 我还以为这里是最不可能见到你们的地方。

original: Tyrion: I suppose you have a point.[p/] I'm only here because of a [i]series[/i] of strange circumstances.
translation: Tyrion: 你说得有道理。[p/]我只是因为<u>一系列</u>突发事件才站在这里。

original: Miriam: I definitely didn't expect to see you again, McCoy.
translation: Miriam: 我也绝对没想到还能再见到你，麦考伊。

original: Celeste: Yeah.[p/] Well, don't get used to it.
translation: Celeste: 对啊。[p/]不过，我们之间也没那么熟。

original: Celeste: I still remember how you treated Tyrion back at the academy.
translation: Celeste: 我仍然记得你在学院的时候是怎么对待提利昂的。

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: Miriam: I still have that tea from the Eastern Kingdoms if you'd like some more.
translation: Miriam: 如果你还想要的话，我还有一些东方古国的茶。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Celeste: Alright,[p/] I'm listening.
translation: Celeste: 那好，[p/]我听着呢。

original: Is [i]that[/i] all it takes to win her over?
translation: 所以<u>这样</u>就能搞定她吗？

original: Miriam: I can't believe someone attacked Aria.[p/] I hope she's okay.
translation: Miriam: 不敢相信有人会袭击阿莉亚。[p/]我希望她还好。

original: Tyrion: I never expected you to care that much about her.
translation: Tyrion: 我没想到你这么关心她。

original: Miriam: Of course, I care about her!
translation: Miriam: 我当然关心她啊！

original: Miriam: E-[p/][s/]Er...[p/] I-[p/][s/]I mean...
translation: Miriam: 呃、[p/][s/]那个……[p/]我、[p/][s/]我意思是……

original: Miriam: How can I prove I'm better than her if she falls at the hand of some common brute?
translation: Miriam: 如果她被区区暴民击倒了，我又怎么证明自己比她更优秀呢？

original: You can see some cracks in her facade.
translation: 你能看出她的伪装出现了破绽。

original: Tyrion: What's your relationship like with Laefe?
translation: Tyrion: 你和拉菲的关系怎么样？

original: Miriam: Nonexistent.[p/] We barely see each other.
translation: Miriam: 没什么关系。[p/]我们几乎见不到面。

original: Celeste: Really?[p/][s/] But she's your sister!
translation: Celeste: 真的吗？[p/][s/]但她是你的姐姐啊！

original: Miriam: Because of her marriage to von Sanctus,[p/] my dad has kept her confined to the manor.
translation: Miriam: 因为她和冯·桑克图斯家的婚约，[p/]我父亲一直把她关在庄园里。

original: Miriam: And I spend almost all of my time at the academy. [mind="I don't like coming back here..."/]
translation: Miriam: 而我又基本上把时间都花在学院里了。[mind="我不喜欢回来这里……"/]

original: It appears that she avoids coming back to her home.
translation: 看起来她在避免回到自己的家里。

original: ...Not that [i]you're[/i] in any position to judge her.
translation: ……但现在<u>你</u>也没有资格评判她。

original: Miriam: Beatrice...[p/] She's changed so much since I last saw her.
translation: Miriam: 比亚特丽丝……[p/]比我最后一次见到她的时候变了太多。

original: Tyrion: What was she like before?
translation: Tyrion: 她以前是什么样子？

original: Miriam: She was far quicker to anger before.[p/] And she never cared about decorum.
translation: Miriam: 她以前易怒得多。[p/]而且从来不在乎礼节。

original: Miriam: She looks so composed and calm now...[p/] It's like she's a totally different person.
translation: Miriam: 她现在看起来冷静而镇定……[p/]就好像已经是另一个人了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about your father, Miriam?
translation: Tyrion: 你能告诉我们什么关于你父亲的事，米莉亚姆？

original: Miriam: I'm sure you know a lot about him, already.[p/] This trial has made his character [i]very[/i] apparent.
translation: Miriam: 你肯定已经知道很多他的事了。[p/]这次庭审让他的性格特点<u>显而易见</u>。

original: Tyrion: And you don't want to refute any of the statements made against him?
translation: Tyrion: 那你就不想反驳任何针对他的言论吗？

original: Miriam: ...
translation: Miriam: ……

original: This seems like a sore spot for her.[p/] Maybe you should change the subject.
translation: 这对她来说好像是个痛处。[p/]你可能得换个话题。

original: Tyrion: You really have no idea where the draft of the will is?
translation: Tyrion: 你真的不知道遗嘱的草稿在哪里吗？

original: Miriam: No.[p/] It [i]should[/i] have been here.
translation: Miriam: 不知道。[p/]它<u>应该</u>在这里的。

original: Considering the circumstances...[p/] The murderer probably took it.
translation: 考虑目前状况……[p/]很可能是凶手拿走了。

original: Tyrion: You have quite a large house, Miriam.
translation: Tyrion: 你们家房子真大啊，米莉亚姆。

original: Tyrion: Many people could only dream of living in this kind of luxury.
translation: Tyrion: 很多人只能梦想拥有这种奢侈的生活。

original: Miriam: Really?[p/] I find it to be very quiet and empty.
translation: Miriam: 是吗？[p/]我倒觉得这里冷清又空寂。

original: Miriam: I much prefer my dorm at the academy.
translation: Miriam: 我觉得学院的宿舍好得多。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about this, Miriam?
translation: Tyrion: 你对这个怎么看，米莉亚姆？

original: Miriam: I'm not sure what you're expecting me to say...
translation: Miriam: 我不知道你想让我说什么……

original: Miriam: Come on...[p/] Where is it?
translation: Miriam: 拜托……[p/]在哪里啊？

original: As you enter William Frega's study,[p/] you spot a figure rummaging through the drawers in his desk.
translation: 进入威廉的书房时，[p/]你看到一个人在书桌的抽屉里不停地翻找。

original: Miriam: Why isn't it here...?[p/] Where else would he put it?
translation: Miriam: 为什么不在这里……？[p/]他还能放到哪里？

original: Celeste: ...Miriam?
translation: Celeste: ……米莉亚姆？

original: Miriam: W-[p/][s/]What?!
translation: Miriam: 怎、[p/][s/]怎么啦？！

original: As soon as she notices you,[p/] Miriam quickly closes the drawers and walks towards you.
translation: 一看到是你们，[p/]米莉亚姆迅速地合上抽屉，向你们走来。

original: But you already saw what she was doing.[p/] She was definitely looking for something.
translation: 但你已经看到她在做什么了。[p/]她肯定是在找什么东西。

original: Tyrion: ...This is a crime scene.[p/] What are you doing here, Miriam?
translation: Tyrion: ……这是犯罪现场。[p/]你在这做什么，米莉亚姆？

original: Miriam: A-[p/][s/]As if that's [i]any[/i] of your business.
translation: Miriam: 好、[p/][s/]好像跟你们有<u>什么</u>关系一样。

original: Tyrion: Considering that [i]I'm[/i] the prosecutor,[p/] it's very much my business.
translation: Tyrion: 考虑到<u>我担任</u>检察官，[p/]这和我很有关系。

original: You give a side glance to the knights stationed outside the room.
translation: 你瞟了一眼房间外驻守的骑士。

original: They [i]should[/i] have stopped her from entering.[p/] But perhaps she used her status to intimidate them into letting her through.
translation: 他们<u>应该</u>要阻止她进来的。[p/]但或许她利用了自己的地位。

original: However,[p/] this [i]could[/i] be a blessing in disguise.
translation: 不管怎么说，[p/]这<u>可能</u>算因祸得福。

original: She was clearly looking for [i]something[/i] in this room.[p/] And you have a feeling you know what it is.
translation: 她明显在这间屋子里找<u>某个东西</u>。[p/]而你也感觉自己知道她在找什么。

original: Tyrion: Anyways,[p/] it looks like we won't be able to find the will.
translation: Tyrion: 总之，[p/]我们看来都没办法找到遗嘱。

original: Tyrion: But the fact that it was taken [i]must[/i] imply something.
translation: Tyrion: 但它被拿走这个事实<u>必定</u>表明了什么。

original: Tyrion: For now,[p/] we should follow our other leads.
translation: Tyrion: 现在，[p/]我们应该追踪其他的线索。

original: Tyrion: There's also the question of [i]who[/i] committed the murder and how.
translation: Tyrion: 还有一个问题，<u>谁</u>实施了这次谋杀，又是怎么做的。

original: Celeste: Don't we already know the "how"?
translation: Celeste: 我们不是已经知道“怎么做”的部分了吗？

original: Celeste: The murderer stole the Sword of Spell Eating and used it to break into the study.
translation: Celeste: 凶手偷走了噬法之剑，用它闯进书房。

original: Tyrion: That's true,[p/] but think about how they would have needed to move around the manor.
translation: Tyrion: 确实，[p/]但得想想他们要怎么在庄园四处活动。

original: Tyrion: The murder took place on the first floor, within William Frega's study.
translation: Tyrion: 凶杀案是在一楼威廉·弗雷加的书房里发生的。

original: Tyrion: But the gallery was on the second floor.
translation: Tyrion: 但画廊在二楼。

original: Tyrion: They would have needed to go upstairs,[p/] steal the sword from the gallery,[p/] and then use it to nullify the lock on the study.
translation: Tyrion: 他们需要先上楼，[p/]在画廊偷出那把剑，[p/]然后用它解除书房的锁。

original: Tyrion: Not only that,[p/] they would have needed to go back upstairs and plant the sword in Beatrice's room.
translation: Tyrion: 不只这样，[p/]他们还得重新上楼，把剑放在比亚特丽丝的房间里。

original: Celeste: About that...[p/] If someone conspired with Beatrice to do this,[p/] why would they plant the sword in her room?
translation: Celeste: 关于这一点……[p/]如果有人和比亚特丽丝合谋此事，[p/]为什么要把剑放到她房间里？

original: Tyrion: That's a good point...
translation: Tyrion: 这是个好问题……

original: Tyrion: Perhaps they had a falling out.[p/] Her partner might've tried to betray her by pinning the blame on her.
translation: Tyrion: 或许他们有分歧。[p/]她的同伙可能背叛了她，试图把责任推到她身上。

original: Celeste: But if that were true,[p/] why wouldn't she just sell them out and make a deal with Steelwind?
translation: Celeste: 但如果是这样，[p/]她干嘛不干脆利用这一点，和斯蒂尔文德做交易？

original: Miriam: It would be because of the Slayer Rule.
translation: Miriam: 或许是因为杀人者规则。

original: Celeste: "Slayer Rule".[p/] I remember the guy at the will reading also mentioned that.[p/] What is it?
translation: Celeste: “杀人者规则”。[p/]我记得遗嘱的宣读人也提到了这个词。[p/]那是什么？

original: Miriam: It was a law passed by the Crown centuries ago.
translation: Miriam: 那是几个世纪前的国王制定的法律。

original: Miriam: According to that law,[p/] if someone is involved in another person's death,[p/] even accidentally,[p/] they will not be allowed to inherit the deceased's property.
translation: Miriam: 根据法律，[p/]如果某人对另一个人的死亡负有责任，[p/]即使出于偶然，[p/]也将被禁止继承死者的遗产。

original: Tyrion: So even [i]if[/i] Beatrice wasn't directly responsible,[p/] she'd lose her cut of the inheritance if she took a plea deal.
translation: Tyrion: 所以即使<u>假定</u>比亚特丽丝没有直接责任，[p/]她也会因此失去自己那部分继承份额。

original: ...More importantly,[p/] it doesn't sound like [i]Miriam[/i] completely believes in Beatrice's innocence either.
translation: ……更重要的是，[p/]<u>米莉亚姆</u>也并不完全相信比亚特丽丝的清白。

original: If [i]that's[/i] true,[p/] what else can she tell you?
translation: 如果<u>确实</u>是这样，[p/]她还能告诉你什么？

original: Tyrion: No...
translation: Tyrion: 不……

original: Tyrion: No![p/][s/] She would never do that!
translation: Tyrion: 不！[p/][s/]她绝不会那么做！

original: Miriam: I-[p/][s/]I'm telling the truth!
translation: Miriam: 我、[p/][s/]我说的是真的呀！

original: Miriam: P-[p/][s/]Please![p/][s/] You can't tell Tymora that I told you![p/][s/] She'll ruin me!
translation: Miriam: 拜、[p/][s/]拜托！[p/][s/]你不能跟泰摩拉说是我告诉你的！[p/][s/]她会毁了我的！

original: The Eye shows that her fear is genuine...[p/] She's not lying.
translation: 荷鲁斯之眼证明她的恐惧是真实的……[p/]她没有说谎。

original: Orym: I’ve seen that woman do all kinds of shady shit in the cases I’ve worked.
translation: Orym: 在我负责的案子里，[p/]我见识过那女人做过的那些肮脏事。

original: Orym: Forgery,[p/] Bribery,[p/] Blackmail.[p/] You name it.
translation: Orym: 伪造、[p/]贿赂、[p/]勒索。[p/]只要是你想得到的。

original: Orym: I’ll bet you’re just the same.[p/] A successor for the devil of defense attorneys.
translation: Orym: 我猜你也和她一样，[p/]虎母无犬子。

original: The rumors...[p/][s/] they can't be true!
translation: 那些传闻……[p/][s/]不应该是真的啊！

original: You refuse to believe it!
translation: 你拒绝相信这些！

original: Celeste: Hey...[p/] Tyrion?[p/] Are you okay?
translation: Celeste: 嘿……[p/]提利昂？[p/]你还好吗？

original: ...Now is not the time to doubt yourself.[p/] There's too much at stake right now.[p/] And you have a job to do.
translation: ……现在不是自我怀疑的时候。[p/]风险太大了，[p/]而你还有该做的事情。

original: Tyrion: ...We should check on Commander White.[p/] He might have found something.
translation: Tyrion: ……我们该去看看怀特指挥官。[p/]他可能发现了什么。

original: Celeste: Um...[p/] Okay.
translation: Celeste: 唔……[p/]好的。

original: Celeste: Just don't push yourself, okay?
translation: Celeste: 但不要勉强自己，好吗？

original: Tyrion: Yeah...
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……

original: ...You'll have plenty of time to think about this later.
translation: ……你之后还有很多时间来仔细思考这件事。

original: The night before.
translation: 前一天晚上。

original: Tyrion: Ugh...[p/] I feel so out of place here.
translation: Tyrion: 呃啊……[p/]我感觉格格不入。

original: Despite your [i]clear[/i] hatred for the nobility,[p/] you've found yourself at a party filled with aristocrats.
translation: 尽管对贵族有着<u>显而易见</u>的仇恨，但现在你却身处一个满是贵族的派对里。

original: You hardly recognize anyone.[p/] But many of the people here clearly recognize [i]you[/i].
translation: 你几乎谁也不认得。[p/]但在场的许多人明显认识<u>你</u>。

original: You're used to receiving dirty looks from the upper class.[p/] But you can literally [i]feel[/i] everyone's disdain for you.
translation: 你早就习惯了来自“上流人士”的鄙夷目光。[p/]但你现在几乎可以<u>感受到</u>每个人对你的蔑视。

original: CDress: Why are you in the corner by yourself?
translation: CDress: 你为什么一个人缩在角落里头？

original: Tyrion: I can't believe I let you talk me into coming here...
translation: Tyrion: 我不敢相信自己会听你的话来这里……

original: Tyrion: I-
translation: Tyrion: 我——

original: For reasons unknown,[p/] you lose your train of thought.
translation: 不知为何，[p/]你大脑一片空白。

original: CDress: I've been wanting to wear this dress for a while now.[p/] What do you think?
translation: CDress: 我之前就一直想穿这身裙子来着。[p/]你觉得怎么样？

original: Tyrion: I-[p/][s/]I...[p/] Um...
translation: Tyrion: 我、[p/][s/]我……[p/]呃……

original: CDress: What's wrong?
translation: CDress: 怎么啦？

original: You suddenly feel extremely flustered.[p/] It's difficult to make eye contact with her.
translation: 你突然觉得十分无所适从，[p/]没办法直视她的眼睛。

original: CDress: Oh, I see...
translation: CDress: 噢，我懂了……

original: CDress: Are you [i]enchanted[/i] by my beauty?
translation: CDress: 你是见了我的美貌，被迷得<u>神魂颠倒</u>了吗？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: CDress: ...
translation: CDress: ……

original: CDress: C-[p/][s/]Come on...[p/] Say something...
translation: CDress: 说、[p/][s/]说话呀……[p/]你倒是说点什么呀……

original: Ever since that night in Aurinax,[p/] you've felt like something has been off between you two...
translation: 自欧奥耐克斯那晚之后，[p/]你们之间的氛围就有些不同寻常……

original: Ruby: ...
translation: Ruby: ……

original: Ruby: Am I interrupting something?
translation: Ruby: 是我坏了你们的兴致吗？

original: Tyrion: M-[p/][s/]Ms. Tymora?
translation: Tyrion: 泰、[p/][s/]泰摩拉女士？

original: Ruby: I wanted to check in on you two before we went to meet with Lord Frega.
translation: Ruby: 见弗雷加勋爵之前，我想先看看你们两个怎么样。

original: You spot a woman silently following behind her.
translation: 你看见了一位安静地跟在她身后的女士。

original: Is she the client that Ms. Tymora is representing?
translation: 她就是泰摩拉女士的委托人吗？

original: You're pretty sure this is your first time meeting her.[p/] But she still looks familiar for some reason.
translation: 你很确定这是第一次见到她。[p/]但不知为何，她看起来十分眼熟。

original: Tyrion: H-[p/][s/]Hi, I'm Tyrion Cuthbert.[p/] I'm Ms. Tymora's...[p/] ward.
translation: Tyrion: 你、[p/][s/]你好，我是提利昂·卡斯伯特。[p/]我是泰摩拉女士的……[p/]学徒。

original: You extend out your hand to shake hers.
translation: 你伸出手想和她握手。

original: She has an aristocratic air to her.[p/] So you hope you're not being too informal.
translation: 她身上有一种贵族气质。[p/]所以你希望自己没有表现得太随便。

original: Instead of taking your hand,[p/] she claps her hands together and takes a deep breath.
translation: 她拍了一下手，深吸一口气。[p/]但是没有和你握手。

original: Tyrion: W-[p/][s/]What...?
translation: Tyrion: 什、[p/][s/]什么……？

original: Beatrice: Ah![p/][s/] S-[p/][s/]Sorry.[p/] I didn't mean to do that.
translation: Beatrice: 啊！[p/][s/]抱、[p/][s/]抱歉，[p/]我不是故意的。

original: Beatrice: It's a bit of a habit of mine.
translation: Beatrice: 这是我的一个习惯。

original: Tyrion: O-[p/]Oh...
translation: Tyrion: 噢、[p/]噢……

original: Nevertheless,[p/] she finally shakes your hand.
translation: 尽管如此，[p/]她最后还是和你握了手。

original: Beatrice: I've heard much about you, Mr. Cuthbert.[p/] My name is Beatrice.
translation: Beatrice: 久闻大名，卡斯伯特先生。[p/]我的名字是比亚特丽丝。

original: You're not sure about the details.[p/] But your mentor appears to be brokering a deal between Beatrice and William Frega.
translation: 你不太清楚具体细节。[p/]但你的导师貌似是比亚特丽丝和威廉·弗雷加的中介。

original: William Frega is the ruling Lord of House Frega.[p/] So you're a little curious about what kind of deal [i]he'd[/i] be involved in.
translation: 威廉·弗雷加是弗雷加家的首脑。[p/]因此你蛮好奇他<u>会</u>参与什么样的协议。

original: ...But you've learned not to pry into your mentor's business.
translation: ……但你知道，最好别打探她工作上的事。

original: Ruby: Anyways,[p/] we'll probably be gone for a while.
translation: Ruby: 总之，[p/]我们会离开一段时间。

original: Ruby: Can I trust you two not to cause trouble?
translation: Ruby: 你们两个能保证不会闯祸吗？

original: Ruby: You're in a manor filled with the highest members of the nobility.
translation: Ruby: 你们现在身处的庄园里满是身份显赫的贵族成员。

original: Ruby: You might meet some familiar yet unfriendly faces.
translation: Ruby: 可能会遇到一些熟悉但充满敌意的面孔。

original: Tyrion: We'll keep a low profile, Ms. Tymora.
translation: Tyrion: 我们会保持低调的，泰摩拉女士。

original: Ruby: Please do.
translation: Ruby: 请务必如此。

original: Tyrion: So...[p/] Why [i]were[/i] you so insistent on accompanying Ms. Tymora to the Lords' Ball?
translation: Tyrion: 所以……[p/]为什么你如此坚持要陪着泰摩拉女士参加勋爵的舞会？

original: CDress: Ah...[p/] That's...
translation: CDress: 啊……[p/]是因为……

original: Tyrion: ...You know you can tell me anything, right?
translation: Tyrion: ……对我你可以无话不谈的，知道吧？

original: CDress: ...
translation: CDress: ……

original: CDress: I guess everything that happened in Aurinax made me think about things...
translation: CDress: 在欧奥耐克斯发生的一切让我思考了很多事……

original: CDress: I don't really know [i]anything[/i] about my past or where I came from.
translation: CDress: 我对我的过去和身世<u>一无所知</u>。

original: CDress: I didn't want to think about it because of my dad and mom,[p/] but...
translation: CDress: 因为养父母的缘故，我不想去考虑这些事，[p/]但……

original: Tyrion: You wanted to find out who your biological parents are.
translation: Tyrion: 你想找出你的亲生父母是谁。

original: CDress: I do...[p/] But I don't know now.
translation: CDress: 是这样的……[p/]但我现在不是很清楚。

original: CDress: Being here is starting to make me feel weird.
translation: CDress: 待在这儿开始让我觉得怪怪的。

original: CDress: I still have my mom.[p/] And looking for my birth parents feels...[p/] wrong somehow.
translation: CDress: 我还有母亲在。[p/]而寻找亲生父母……[p/]总觉得不太对。

original: Tyrion: ...I don't think that's true.
translation: Tyrion: ……我倒不这么认为。

original: CDress: Really?
translation: CDress: 真的吗？

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora adopted me when I was a child.[p/] And she gave me a purpose in life.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士在我还是孩童时收养了我。[p/]她还给了我人生目标。

original: Tyrion: But I still keep my childhood memories of my mother close to me.
translation: Tyrion: 但我仍把童年时对母亲的记忆珍藏在心底。

original: Tyrion: Ms. Tymora and my mother are both important to me.
translation: Tyrion: 泰摩拉女士和我母亲都是我最重要的人。

original: Tyrion: I don't think it's disrespectful to find out more about yourself.[p/] And I'm sure your mother will understand.
translation: Tyrion: 所以我不认为寻找自己的身世是件多么失礼的事。[p/]而且我相信你母亲也会理解的。

original: CDress: You think so?
translation: CDress: 真的吗？

original: Tyrion: Of course.
translation: Tyrion: 当然。

original: Tyrion: ...And I'm [i]also[/i] sure of another thing.
translation: Tyrion: ……而且<u>还有</u>另一件事我很确定。

original: Tyrion: If [i]I'm[/i] with you,[p/] I doubt any of the nobles here will want to speak with you.
translation: Tyrion: 只要<u>我</u>在你身边，[p/]肯定不会有贵族来和你搭话的。

original: CDress: Yeah...[p/] I didn't want to be rude,[p/] but...
translation: CDress: 是啊……[p/]我不想表现得很无礼，[p/]但……

original: Tyrion: Don't worry.[p/] I can find something to fill the time.
translation: Tyrion: 别担心。[p/]我可以找点事来打发时间。

original: CDress: ...You're just going to play chess alone, aren't you?
translation: CDress: ……你不会又要自己一个人下棋了吧？

original: Tyrion: ...Maybe?
translation: Tyrion: ……不好说哦？

original: CDress: You really need to learn to talk to other people.
translation: CDress: 你真得学着和别人交流了。

original: CDress: Make some new friends or something.
translation: CDress: 交点朋友之类的。

original: Tyrion: I don't need more friends.[p/] I usually want to spend most of my time with you, anyways.
translation: Tyrion: 我不需要朋友。[p/]反正我大部分时候也只想和你一起。

original: CDress: ...!
translation: CDress: ……！

original: CDress: A-[p/][s/]Anyways,[p/] I'm going to try to talk to some people.
translation: CDress: 总、[p/][s/]总之，[p/]我要去和别人聊聊。

original: Tyrion: Yeah.[p/] I'll see you later.
translation: Tyrion: 好吧。[p/]待会儿见。

original: Celeste leaves to mingle with some of the other partygoers.
translation: 塞莱斯特去和其他宾客攀谈了。

original: You find yourself with very little to do.[p/] And you doubt anyone would want to engage in small talk from the likes of you.
translation: 你自己则没什么事做。[p/]你也不觉得会有人愿意和你闲聊。

original: ...Your hand instinctively goes to your satchel.[p/] It contains your foldable chessboard.
translation: ……你的手本能地伸向挎包。[p/]里面装着你的折叠棋盘。

original: Tyrion: Well...[p/] It's not as if I have anything better to do.
translation: Tyrion: 嗯……[p/]反正也没事做。

original: Tyrion: I should try to find an empty table to play on.
translation: Tyrion: 得找个空余的桌子下棋。

original: Tyrion: It's as if every room in this house needs a chandelier...
translation: Tyrion: 这个庄园里的每个房间好像都需要一个吊灯……

original: Tyrion: What a waste of the kingdom's gold...
translation: Tyrion: 真是浪费……

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some adventurers in a tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 酒馆里冒险者的画像。

original: Tyrion: Supposedly,[p/] one of Frega's ancestors was part of a band of adventurers.
translation: Tyrion: 据说，[p/]其中一位冒险者是弗雷加家族的祖先。

original: But you can't help but feel that there [i]should[/i] be someone in the top left corner.
translation: 但你总觉得左上角<u>应该</u>有人。

original: Tyrion: It's a painting of some adventurers in a tavern.
translation: Tyrion: 酒馆里冒险者的画像。

original: Lloyd: Ah.[p/] This must be Beatrice Frega the First.
translation: Lloyd: 啊。[p/]这一定是比亚特丽丝·弗雷加一世。

original: Tyrion: The First?
translation: Tyrion: 一世？

original: Lloyd: According to legend,[p/] she was one of the descendants of the seven heroes of Wyverngarde.
translation: Lloyd: 根据传说，[p/]她是维文加德七英雄中一位的后代。

original: Lloyd: She joined a band of adventurers that were traveling across the nation.
translation: Lloyd: 她加入了一个周游全国的冒险队。

original: It's hard to imagine the Fregas coming from such humble beginnings.
translation: 很难想象弗雷加一族出身如此平凡。

original: Tyrion: Wait...[p/] What?
translation: Tyrion: 等下……[p/]什么？

original: Lloyd: What is it now?
translation: Lloyd: 怎么了？

original: Tyrion: That muscular man in the corner...[p/][s/] He just vanished!
translation: Tyrion: 墙角的肌肉男……[p/][s/]他消失了！

original: Lloyd: What are you on about?[p/] There was never a man there...
translation: Lloyd: 你在说什么？[p/]那从来没有什么男人……

original: Celeste: Sorry, Tyrion.[p/] But he's right.
translation: Celeste: 抱歉，提利昂。[p/]但他说得对。

original: Tyrion: No![p/][s/] I'm [i]sure[/i] he was there!
translation: Tyrion: 怎么可能！[p/][s/]我很<u>确定</u>他刚刚就在那！

original: Celeste: Are you feeling okay?
translation: Celeste: 你没事吧？

original: Tyrion: ...
translation: Tyrion: ……

original: Perhaps your lack of sleep is making you see things that aren't there...
translation: 或许是睡眠不足让你看到了一些不存在的东西……

original: Tyrion: It's a shelf filled with books.
translation: Tyrion: 摆满书的架子。

original: Celeste: [i]Fake[/i] books.[p/] They're completely blank.
translation: Celeste: <u>假书</u>。[p/]都是空白的。

original: Tyrion: It's a door that leads to the Coat Room.
translation: Tyrion: 通往衣帽间的门。

original: Tyrion: It's a chair made from mahogany.
translation: Tyrion: 一张由桃花心木制成的椅子。

original: Tyrion: Every part of this house just exudes wealth...
translation: Tyrion: 这房子的每一处都散发着财富的气息……

original: Wealth that's been siphoned out of the commonfolk.
translation: 从平民百姓身上榨取的财富。

original: Tyrion: There's a window with a view of the outside.
translation: Tyrion: 可以看到外面的窗户。

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] it's just one mess after another with you.
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]遇上你之后就是一个接着一个的麻烦。

original: Tyrion: "Mess"?[p/] Wouldn't [i]you[/i] have much to gain from William Frega's death?
translation: Tyrion: “麻烦”？[p/]威廉·弗雷加的死不是会让<u>你</u>受益良多吗？

original: Lloyd: On a surface level,[p/] you might be right.[p/] But it's far more complicated than that.
translation: Lloyd: 从表面上来说，[p/]你可能是对的。[p/]但实际要比这复杂的多。

original: Lloyd: House Frega controls the banking houses.[p/] They are the main pillar of support for Wyverngarde's economy.
translation: Lloyd: 弗雷加家族控制银行机构。[p/]他们是维文加德经济的主要支柱。

original: Lloyd: William's death could have unimaginable economic consequences,[p/] [i]regardless[/i] of who inherits his house.
translation: Lloyd: <u>无论</u>谁继承他的遗产，[p/]威廉的死都会造成不可估量的经济影响。

original: Lloyd: I wouldn't be foolish enough to do something like that.
translation: Lloyd: 我不会蠢到去做这种事。

original: Tyrion: ...That remains to be seen.
translation: Tyrion: ……这还有待证明。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Think what you will.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]随你怎么想。

original: Lloyd: There are others who would benefit from William Frega's death.
translation: Lloyd: 还有其他人会因威廉·弗雷加的死而获利。

original: Tyrion: You mentioned that other people would benefit from Frega's death.[p/] Who specifically?
translation: Tyrion: 你说还有其他人会因弗雷加的死而获利。[p/]具体是谁？

original: Lloyd: If I had to venture a guess,[p/] I would say Lucio Steelwind benefits the most.
translation: Lloyd: 如果让我大胆猜测，[p/]卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德会是受益最大的那个。

original: Tyrion: Do you mean the prosecutor's father?[p/]
translation: Tyrion: 你是指检察官的父亲？[p/]

original: Tyrion: But you [i]just[/i] said that Lord Frega's death could have unimaginable consequences for the economy.
translation: Tyrion: 但你<u>刚刚</u>才提到，弗雷加勋爵的死会造成不可估量的经济后果。

original: Lloyd: Ha![p/] Do you think that brute [i]cares[/i] about Wyverngarde's economy?
translation: Lloyd: 哈！[p/]你真以为那个野蛮人<u>在乎</u>维文加德的经济吗？

original: Lloyd: No...[p/] All that man cares about is power.[p/] Pure and physical power.
translation: Lloyd: 不……[p/]那个男人满脑子都是力量。[p/]纯粹的力量。

original: Lloyd: House Steelwind and House Frega have been fighting for control of Wyverngarde for generations.
translation: Lloyd: 斯蒂尔文德家族与弗雷加家族世世代代都在争夺维文加德的控制权。

original: Lloyd: And in this long-lasting era of peace,[p/] the Steelwinds' military have become far less valuable to the Crown.
translation: Lloyd: 在这长久的和平时期里，[p/]斯蒂尔文德的军事力量对王室价值早已大不如前。

original: Lloyd: If it weren't for Lady Steelwind's engagement to the Crown Prince,[p/] they might not even be considered a Pillar family anymore.
translation: Lloyd: 如果不是斯蒂尔文德女士与王储殿下订婚，[p/]他们可能都不再被视为王国的支柱家族了。

original: Lloyd: The death of William Frega is probably exactly what Lucio Steelwind has been waiting for.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉·弗雷加的死或许正是卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德多年等待的机会。

original: Lloyd: And if our economy were to suffer,[p/] it would cause civil unrest.
translation: Lloyd: 如果我们的经济遭受重创，[p/]一定会造成国内局势动荡。

original: Lloyd: In a scenario like that,[p/] the Crown would [i]have[/i] to rely on Steelwind's forces to maintain order.
translation: Lloyd: 事态这么发展下去的话，[p/]王室就<u>必须</u>依靠斯蒂尔文德的军事力量来维持统治。

original: That [i]does[/i] make sense...[p/] But could Aria's father [i]really[/i] be involved with this?
translation: <u>确实</u>有道理……[p/]但阿莉亚的父亲<u>真的</u>与此事有关吗？

original: Tyrion: It's clear that you think Lucio Steelwind would have much to gain from this.[p/] But can you think of anyone else?
translation: Tyrion: 显然卢西奥·斯蒂尔文德可以获益。[p/]但你觉得还有其他人选吗？

original: Lloyd: Well, there [i]is[/i] Harold Haroldson.
translation: Lloyd: 哎，<u>还有</u>哈罗德·哈罗德森。

original: Celeste: ...That [i]can't[/i] be his real name.
translation: Celeste: ……他<u>不可能</u>真叫这名字。

original: Tyrion: But what would Mr. Haroldson possibly gain from Frega's death?
translation: Tyrion: 可哈罗德森先生能从弗雷加的死中得到什么呢？

original: Lloyd: From what I've heard,[p/] William was planning to defund the Haroldson Hall of History.
translation: Lloyd: 据我所知，[p/]威廉正打算削减哈罗德森历史长廊的经费。

original: Tyrion: Really...[p/] Why would he do that?
translation: Tyrion: 真的吗……[p/]他为什么要这么做？

original: Lloyd: I'm not sure of the specifics.[p/]
translation: Lloyd: 我也不是很清楚具体的细节。[p/]

original: Lloyd: But supposedly,[p/] Lord Haroldson has refused to...[p/] omit the less flattering parts of Wyverngarde's history from his exhibits.
translation: Lloyd: 但据说，[p/]哈罗德森勋爵拒绝……[p/]撤下维文加德历史中不那么光鲜的遗物。

original: Lloyd: It's gotten blatant enough that he's drawn the ire of the king himself.
translation: Lloyd: 他的大胆行径已经引起了国王本人的不满。

original: Lloyd: They actually got into a very heated argument during the Lords' Ball about it.
translation: Lloyd: 他们实际上在勋爵的舞会上就此问题吵得很凶。

original: Lloyd: I heard that William declared he would be removing House Haroldson from his estate.
translation: Lloyd: 我听说威廉宣布要从资产里移除哈罗德森家族。

original: You don't want to suspect Mr. Haroldson...[p/] But you need to examine every possibility.
translation: 你不想去怀疑哈罗德森先生……[p/]但你必须考虑所有可能性。

original: As the curator,[p/] he would have the easiest access to the Sword of Spell Eating.[p/] And he could have staged a robbery to cover his tracks.
translation: 作为馆长，[p/]他能轻松地获取噬法之剑，[p/]也能自导自演一场展品劫案来掩盖自身行踪。

original: At the very least,[p/] you should give Mr. Haroldson a chance to explain himself.
translation: 至少，[p/]你应该给哈罗德森先生一次澄清自己的机会。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about the defendant in this case?
translation: Tyrion: 关于本案的被告你有什么要说的吗？

original: Lloyd: What?[p/] She's [i]your[/i] client.[p/] Surely, you would know her better than I.
translation: Lloyd: 啥？[p/]她是<u>你的</u>委托人。[p/]你肯定比我要了解的多。

original: Tyrion: ...Humour me.
translation: Tyrion: ……麻烦配合一下。

original: Lloyd: Well, I'm sure you're aware that she fled the Frega estate five years ago.
translation: Lloyd: 好吧，你肯定已经知道她在五年前离开了弗雷加庄园。

original: Lloyd: In doing so,[p/] she dealt a blow to House Frega's reputation [i]and[/i] directly insulted the Crown Prince by breaking her engagement to him.
translation: Lloyd: 她的不辞而别影响重大，[p/]不仅让弗雷加家的声誉急转之下，<u>而且</u>还解除了与王储殿下的婚约，这与侮辱王室无异。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]Beatrice[/i] was engaged to Aster?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>比亚特丽丝</u>曾与阿斯特有过婚约？！

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] It was quite the scandal at the time.
translation: Lloyd: 没错。[p/]这事在当时可是桩相当大的丑闻。

original: Lloyd: And Lucio wasted no time in pushing his daughter into taking Beatrice's place.
translation: Lloyd: 之后卢西奥毫不犹豫地让自己的女儿取而代之。

original: Celeste: Oh...[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why those three were so awkward last night?
translation: Celeste: 哦……[p/]想必<u>这</u>就是他们三个当晚如此尴尬的原因吧？

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] this situation is just an absolute mess. [mind="And that woman's return will complicate things."/]
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]现在的状况简直就是一团糟。 [mind="而且那女人的归来只会把这一切搅得更复杂。"/]

original: Beatrice's return "complicates things"?[p/] What did he mean by that?
translation: 比亚特丽丝的归来“会把一切搅得更复杂”？[p/]那是什么意思？

original: Tyrion: ...Do you find Beatrice's return to be inconvenient for you?
translation: Tyrion: ……你认为比亚特丽丝的归来让你很不便吗？

original: Lloyd: ...What are you on about now?
translation: Lloyd: ……你现在又想说什么？

original: Tyrion: Please.[p/] Don't insult my intelligence, von Sanctus.
translation: Tyrion: 拜托，[p/]请别侮辱我的智商，冯·桑克图斯。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Lloyd: ...Fine.[p/] If you [i]must[/i] know,[p/] my son was arranged to marry William's daughter: Laefe.
translation: Lloyd: ……行吧。[p/]如果你<u>一定</u>要知道的话，[p/]我的儿子要与威廉的女儿拉菲结婚。

original: Tyrion: Laefe?
translation: Tyrion: 拉菲？

original: Lloyd: Since Beatrice showed no signs of returning,[p/] it was apparent that [i]Laefe[/i] would inherit House Frega instead of her.
translation: Lloyd: 由于比亚特丽丝没有回来的迹象，[p/]<u>拉菲</u>看起来会代替她继承弗雷加家。

original: Lloyd: I know when my days are numbered.[p/] So I took pre-emptive action.
translation: Lloyd: 我知道自己日渐式微。[p/]所以我就先发制人了。

original: Lloyd: William wanted a male heir,[p/] and [i]I[/i] needed to preserve my House.[p/] So we both came to an accord.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉想要一个男性继承者，[p/]而<u>我</u>需要延续我的家族。[p/]所以我们达成了一个协议。

original: Lloyd: My son and Laefe were arranged to be wed.
translation: Lloyd: 我的儿子和拉菲将会结婚。

original: Lloyd: House von Sanctus would have been absorbed.[p/] But at least my Jaiden would stand at the helm of House Frega.
translation: Lloyd: 冯·桑克图斯家将被收纳入弗雷加家。[p/]但至少我儿子杰登能站在弗雷加家掌舵的位置。

original: Celeste: ...You nobles are absolutely awful. [mind="I should probably consider myself lucky..."/]
translation: Celeste: ……你们这些贵族简直是糟透了。[mind="某种程度上来说，我运气不错……"/]

original: Lloyd: Think what you will.[p/] I wouldn't expect a commoner to understand.
translation: Lloyd: 随你怎么想。[p/]我本就不觉得平民能理解。

original: Celeste: ...
translation: Celeste: ……

original: Lloyd: That's the problem with your generation.[p/] You have no sense of duty or obligation.
translation: Lloyd: 这就是你们这代人的问题。[p/]没有丝毫的责任与义务感。

original: Lloyd: Laefe has already expressed resistance to this marriage.[p/] Even though she was well aware of the details.
translation: Lloyd: 拉菲在了解这一切之后，还是对这场婚约表现的很抵触。

original: Lloyd: Now I worry she'll hide behind her sister to end the engagement altogether.
translation: Lloyd: 现在我担心她会躲在她姐姐身后彻底拒绝婚约。

original: Laefe never mentioned [i]any[/i] of this.[p/] And as much as you hate to think it,[p/] William's death [i]would[/i] get her out of this arranged marriage.
translation: 拉菲<u>从没</u>提过这件事。[p/]尽管你不愿这么想，但威廉的死<u>必定能</u>让她逃离这场包办婚姻。

original: You should talk to her about this.
translation: 你应该找她聊聊这件事。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] I really hoped that I'd seen the last of you in Aurinax.
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]我真的希望欧奥耐克斯之后不要再见到你们。

original: Tyrion: And [i]I[/i] really hope you're not involved in what happened to William Frega.
translation: Tyrion: <u>我</u>也由衷希望你与威廉·弗雷加案无关。

original: Lloyd: Please.[p/] As if I'd even humor such preposterous accusations.
translation: Lloyd: 拜托，[p/]别把这么可笑的事说得煞有介事。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] As usual,[p/] the Steelwind brat is sticking her nose where it doesn't belong.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]斯蒂尔文德家的小鬼还是一如既往喜欢到处打听。

original: Tyrion: I take it you're not a fan of House Steelwind?
translation: Tyrion: 我可以理解成你不太喜欢斯蒂尔文德家族吗？

original: Lloyd: Fan?[p/] Hardly.[p/] Those brutes have no place in our civilized kingdom.
translation: Lloyd: 喜欢？[p/]绝对不可能。这些野蛮人就不应存在于我们文明的国度中。

original: Tyrion: And yet,[p/] I can't help but feel like you'd never say that to her face.
translation: Tyrion: 但是呢，[p/]我有种你绝对不敢当她面说这话的感觉。

original: Lloyd: Ugh...[p/] You [i]and[/i] that woman...
translation: Lloyd: 呃啊……[p/]你<u>和</u>那个女人……

original: Lloyd: You two do nothing but weave chaos into the nobility.
translation: Lloyd: 你们两个只会给贵族添麻烦。

original: Tyrion: With how you aristocrats abuse your power,[p/] I'll take that as a compliment.
translation: Tyrion: 鉴于你们这些贵族滥用权力猖獗，[p/]我就当你是在夸我了。

original: Lloyd: William Frega...[p/] Even in death,[p/] he still remains a thorn in my side.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉·弗雷加……[p/]即使他已经死了，[p/]也还在给我添麻烦。

original: Lloyd: At least now,[p/] he won't meddle in my affairs.
translation: Lloyd: 但至少现在，[p/]他再也不会妨碍我了。

original: Tyrion: What can you tell me about the suspect in this case?
translation: Tyrion: 关于本案的被告你有什么要说的吗？

original: Lloyd: What?[p/] She's [i]your[/i] client.[p/] Surely, you would know her better than I do.
translation: Lloyd: 啥？[p/]她是<u>你的</u>委托人。[p/]你肯定比我要了解的多。

original: Tyrion: ...Humour me.
translation: Tyrion: ……麻烦配合一下。

original: Lloyd: Well, I'm sure you're aware that she fled the Frega estate five years ago.
translation: Lloyd: 好吧，你肯定已经知道她在五年前离开了弗雷加庄园。

original: Lloyd: In doing so,[p/] she dealt a blow to House Frega's reputation [i]and[/i] directly insulted the Crown Prince by breaking her engagement to him.
translation: Lloyd: 她的不辞而别影响重大，[p/]不仅让弗雷加家的声誉急转之下，<u>而且</u>还解除了与王储殿下的婚约，这与侮辱王室无异。

original: Celeste: Wait...[p/][s/] [i]Beatrice[/i] was engaged to Aster?!
translation: Celeste: 等等……[p/][s/]<u>比亚特丽丝</u>曾与阿斯特有过婚约？！

original: Lloyd: Yes.[p/] It was quite the scandal at the time.
translation: Lloyd: 没错。[p/]这事在当时可是桩相当大的丑闻。

original: Lloyd: And Lucio wasted no time in forcing his daughter into taking Beatrice's place.
translation: Lloyd: 之后卢西奥毫不犹豫地让自己的女儿取而代之。

original: Celeste: Oh...[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why those three were so awkward last night?
translation: Celeste: 哦……[p/]想必<u>这</u>就是他们三个当晚如此尴尬的原因吧？

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] this situation is just an absolute mess. [mind="And that woman's return will complicate things."/]
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]现在的状况简直就是一团糟。 [mind="而且那女人的归来只会把这一切搅得更复杂。"/]

original: Beatrice's return "complicates things"?[p/] What did he mean by that?
translation: 比亚特丽丝的归来“会把一切搅得更复杂”？[p/]那是什么意思？

original: Lloyd: Laefe...[p/] I'm sure she'll use William's death as yet [i]another[/i] excuse to further avoid her obligations.
translation: Lloyd: 拉菲……[p/]她肯定会用威廉的死作为<u>另一个</u>逃避义务的借口。

original: Celeste: She just lost her father![p/][s/] What is [i]wrong[/i] with you?!
translation: Celeste: 她刚刚失去了自己的父亲！[p/][s/]你这人有什么<u>毛病</u>？！

original: Lloyd: William Frega may be dead,[p/] but his daughters must carry out their roles.[p/] Lest their House's reputation suffers.
translation: Lloyd: 威廉·弗雷加虽然死了，[p/]但他的女儿们必须履行自身的职责。[p/]不然有损家族荣誉。

original: Tyrion: Is that all you care about?[p/] The reputation of the noble houses?[p/] What about justice for William Frega?
translation: Tyrion: 你只在乎这种事吗？[p/]贵族的声望？[p/]那谁给威廉·弗雷加讨回公道？

original: Lloyd: Justice?[p/] Justice is an illusion for you commoners to cling onto.[p/] But for us,[p/] "justice" is simply a favourable outcome.
translation: Lloyd: 正义？[p/]正义只是你们这些平民紧抓不放的幻象。[p/]对于我们而言，[p/]“正义”只是对某方有利的结果罢了。

original: Lloyd: The Frega family has always been influential.[p/] But with William's death,[p/] their power has diminished.
translation: Lloyd: 弗雷加家族一直声势显赫。[p/]但威廉的死削弱了他们的力量。

original: Lloyd: And with Laefe's reluctance to fulfill her duties,[p/] the Frega name will continue to suffer.
translation: Lloyd: 如果拉菲迟迟不愿履行自己的职责，[p/]弗雷加之名只会愈加受损。

original: Celeste: You're absolutely despicable!
translation: Celeste: 你真是卑鄙！

original: Lloyd: Ah...[p/] Aster do Wyverngarde, the Crown Prince himself.
translation: Lloyd: 啊……[p/]阿斯特·维文加德，王储殿下本人。

original: Lloyd: I can't say I care much for his childish ideals of justice.
translation: Lloyd: 我不太喜欢他有关正义的幼稚理想。

original: Tyrion: Those "childish ideals" are true justice.
translation: Tyrion: 那些“幼稚理想”才是真正的正义。

original: Tyrion: It's not something the likes of [i]you[/i] can recognize.
translation: Tyrion: 不是<u>你</u>这种人能理解的。

original: Lloyd: Harold Haroldson...?
translation: Lloyd: 哈罗德·哈罗德森……？

original: Lloyd: I couldn't care less about that quack's personal affairs.[p/] He can find financial aid elsewhere.
translation: Lloyd: 我才不在乎那江湖骗子的破事。[p/]他可以去其他地方找经济援助。

original: Lloyd: Honestly,[p/] it's just one mess after another with you.
translation: Lloyd: 说实话，[p/]遇上你之后就是一个接着一个的麻烦。

original: Tyrion: "Mess"?[p/] I would think that [i]you'd[/i] have much to gain from William Frega's death.
translation: Tyrion: “麻烦”？[p/]威廉·弗雷加的死不是会让<u>你</u>受益良多吗？

original: Lloyd: On a surface level,[p/] you might be right.[p/] But it's far more complicated than that.
translation: Lloyd: 从表面上来说，[p/]你可能是对的。[p/]但实际要比这复杂的多。

original: Lloyd: House Frega controls the banking houses.[p/] They are the main pillar of support for Wyverngarde's economy.
translation: Lloyd: 弗雷加家族控制银行机构。[p/]他们是维文加德经济的主要支柱。

original: Lloyd: William's death could have unimaginable economic consequences,[p/] [i]regardless[/i] of who inherits his house.
translation: Lloyd: <u>无论</u>谁继承他的遗产，[p/]威廉的死都会造成不可估量的经济影响。

original: Lloyd: I wouldn't be stupid enough to be involved in something like this.
translation: Lloyd: 我不会蠢到去做这种事。

original: Tyrion: ...That remains to be seen.
translation: Tyrion: ……这还有待证明。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Think what you will.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]随你怎么想。

original: Lloyd: There are others who would benefit from William Frega's death.
translation: Lloyd: 还有其他人会因威廉·弗雷加的死而获利。

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] Beatrice's rebellious nature is only a result of William's terrible parenting.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]比亚特丽丝的叛逆本性都要怪威廉糟糕的教育。

original: Lloyd: You'd never catch my Jaiden acting like that.
translation: Lloyd: 我儿子杰登可绝对不会这样。

original: Tyrion: What do you think about this, von Sanctus?
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯，你对这个有什么看法？

original: Lloyd: Hmph...[p/] I doubt I can say anything meaningful.
translation: Lloyd: 哼……[p/]我不知道我能说什么。

original: Lloyd: Ask someone else.
translation: Lloyd: 去问问别人吧。

original: You explore the manor further and find one of its many sitting rooms.
translation: 你继续探索庄园，来到了众多会客室中的一个。

original: ...And there,[p/] you happen to spot a [i]very[/i] familiar face.
translation: ……你在这里发现了一张<u>非常</u>熟悉的面孔。

original: He's sipping on a glass of wine.[p/] And his expression turns disdainful the moment you enter the room.
translation: 他正在小酌一杯。[p/]一看见你进门，他的表情便变得满是鄙夷。

original: Lloyd: Oh...[p/] wonderful.[p/] As if my day couldn't have gotten [i]any[/i] worse.
translation: Lloyd: 哦……[p/]太棒了。[p/]真是不能<u>再</u>糟了。

original: Tyrion: Von Sanctus.[p/] What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Tyrion: 冯·桑克图斯。[p/]<u>你</u>在这儿做什么？

original: Lloyd: The head of a noble house has just been murdered.[p/] I can't very well return to Aurinax when my affairs are in such disarray.
translation: Lloyd: 贵族家族的首脑之一刚刚遭到谋杀。[p/]我没法在如此混乱的情况下回到欧奥耐克斯。

original: Lloyd: Anyways,[p/] forget what [i]I'm[/i] doing here.[p/] What are [i]you[/i] doing here?
translation: Lloyd: 总之，[p/]别管我在这儿做什么。[p/]<u>你</u>在这儿乱晃什么呢？

original: Tyrion: Oh,[p/] I just wanted to have a friendly chat with one of my [i]favorite[/i] noblemen.
translation: Tyrion: 哦，[p/]我只是想和我“<u>最喜欢</u>”的贵族之一友好交谈。

original: Tyrion: I hear that you've been keeping busy since we last met.[p/] It must be difficult losing your empire to House Frega.
translation: Tyrion: 我听说上次见面之后你就一直忙个不停。[p/]把商业帝国拱手让给弗雷加家族一定很不好受吧。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: Celeste: Tyrion...[p/] We [i]do[/i] need his help.
translation: Celeste: 提利昂……[p/]我们<u>确实</u>需要他的帮助。

original: Lloyd: Is that so?[p/] And what makes you think I'd [i]ever[/i] help the likes of you?
translation: Lloyd: 是吗？[p/]我为什么要帮助你们这样的人呢？

original: Tyrion: Because it would take suspicion off of you.[p/] And let's face it,[p/] with your reputation,[p/] you could use all the help you can get.
translation: Tyrion: 因为这能撇清你的嫌疑。[p/]面对现实吧，[p/]以你现在的名声，[p/]你需要尽可能多的帮助。

original: Lloyd: How dare you![p/][s/] I'll have you know that I am still a respected member of the nobility!
translation: Lloyd: 你怎么敢！[p/][s/]你给我听好，我仍是备受尊敬的贵族之一！

original: Tyrion: "Respected"?[p/] Is [i]that[/i] why everyone is talking about your hand in Justin Waye's death?
translation: Tyrion: “备受尊敬”？[p/]你是指人人都在讨论你害死贾斯汀·维耶的事吗？

original: Tyrion: Because the way I see it,[p/] being involved in [i]another[/i] scandal would destroy what little remains of your reputation.
translation: Tyrion: 因为在我看来，[p/]牵扯进<u>另一个</u>丑闻只会毁掉你仅剩不多的名誉。

original: Tyrion: But it makes no difference to me.[p/] And to be perfectly honest,[p/] I'd like nothing more than to drag you onto the stand and embarrass you a [i]second[/i] time.
translation: Tyrion: 但这对我来说没什么区别。[p/]而且说实话，[p/]我不介意<u>再</u>把你拖到证人席上羞辱一次。

original: Lloyd: ...
translation: Lloyd: ……

original: You can practically hear him grinding his teeth together.
translation: 你几乎能听到他咬牙切齿的声音。

original: Lloyd: ...Very well.
translation: Lloyd: ……非常好。

original: Lloyd: If it means I won't have to endure your presence any longer,[p/] I'll oblige and answer your questions.
translation: Lloyd: 如果这样做能让我不必继续忍受你的存在，[p/]那我就答应回答你的问题。

original: Anyways,[p/] von Sanctus gave you a decent list of suspects.
translation: 总之，[p/]冯·桑克图斯让你有了更充实的嫌疑犯名单。
